A varanda deste apartamento fica virada para uma das praças mais recentes da Rua das Flores, a Praça das Cardosas. Informamos os nossos hospedes que no prédio ao lado está em reconstrução.   Os trabalhos na obra realizam se entre as 8 da manha e as 18 horas, de segunda a sexta feira. A sua chegada e durante a sua estadia estarei sempre dispon
neighborhood_overview: A cidade do Porto está cheia de atrações turísticas. Mesmo pertinho temos a Estação de São Bento, a Igreja da Sé, a Praça da Liberdade, a Torre dos Clérigos, a Livraria Lello, o Museu da Fotografia, o Palácio da Bolsa, o Mercado do Bolhão, Rua Santa Catarina e sem esquecer a zona da Ribeira e muito mais… Do outro lado do rio, mas perto também, encontra o Cais de Gaia onde pode disfrutar de uma visita as caves do Vinho do Porto como também uma viagem de teleférico onde pode apreciar uma belíssima vista sobre a cidade do Porto. A 1 minuto do apartamento encontra agências de turismo, estação de metro, estação de comboio, praça de táxi, autocarros turísticos e tradicionais e parque de estacionamento. Se for apreciador de praia, a nossa cidade tem ótimos acessos às praias e á costa. Para uma saída noturna e sem complicações encontra a 5 minutos uma zona de bares e discotecas. E sem esquecer, esta zona esta privilegiada com variadíssimos restaurantes para que possa apreciar a fantástica comi
notes: Informamos os nossos hospedes que no prédio ao lado está em reconstrução.   Os trabalhos na obra realizam se entre as 8 da manha e as 18 horas, de segunda a sexta feira.
transit: Caso venha de avião tem sempre o metro ou táxi.  Se usar o metro , segue ate a  Estação da Trindade e ai tem de mudar de linha. Muda para a linha amarela sentido Santo Ovidio e sai em São Bento.
interaction: A sua chegada e durante a sua estadia estarei sempre disponível para o receber e dar-lhe algumas dicas sobre a vida da cidade.
house_rules: Se fumar, só pedimos que o faça na varanda.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
A casa está otimamente bem localizada, perfeito para quem quer conhecer a baixa da cidade a pé. O apartamento está como novo e, apesar de próximo dos locais mais frequentados ao fim de semana, é muito sossegado.
Recomendo e com certeza que vou voltar.

Excelente experiência!
Voltaremos de certeza :)

A localização do apartamento é excelente! Tivemos duas noites muito sossegadas, não houve mesmo barulho nenhum no prédio. A cama é confortável, a casa de banho é decente (há secador). A limpeza impressionou-nos imediatamente!

Muy buena elección!!andreia esta pendiente en todo momento y te hace sentir como en casa, el apartamento en el centro de Oporto y todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en la ciudad, tal y como aparece en las fotos, para dormir no se escuchaba un solo ruido y todo muy nuevo. 100% recomendable!!

Andreia foi muito amavel e disponobilizou tudo que necessario no apartamento. O Apartamento é moderno, impecável e no centro do Porto . Sem duvida recomendo. Andreia was very helpful and had everything you need in the apartment. It was modern, impeccable and right in the city centre. Highly recommended!

El apartamento es tal y como aparece en las fotos, muy limpio y acogedor. Con microondas, nevera, cafetera nespresso y había café, fruta... Andreia trabaja en la cafetería que hay debajo por lo que es fácil encontrarla si hay cualquier problema. La calle en la que está el apartamento es peatonal con tiendas y cafeterias en pleno centro pero lo bueno es que la habitación da a una zona interior por lo que no se oye ningún ruido.  Lo recomendamos sin ninguna duda!
Nos encantó el apartamento, céntrico, muy limpio y Andrea se porto muy bien con nosotros. Gracias por todo

Recomendo a todos se hospedarem com a Andréia.
Muito simpática e receptiva. Excelente apartamento e localização.

This is a small and very comfortable apartment. The location is excellent. It is just one minute walk to metro and train station. And it is located in a central area. Andrea is very nice and helpful. She responses every email I sent very quickly and provides all the information I need. I would choose to stay at this apartment again next time if I travelled there.

Andreia es una muy buena anfitriona, el departamento es justo como se muestra en las imágenes, está en el centro, muy cerca de una estación de metro, nos encanto hospedarnos allí, Andreia nos proporcionó una hoja con los lugares más representativos de Oporto, nos atendió muy bien !

Ce studio est idéalement placé dans le centre de Porto. Il est suffisant pour une courte durée, très propre et dispose du nécessaire. Tout correspondait à nos attentes et au descriptif / photos, donc nickel ! Andreia nous a bien reçu et reste disponible pendant le séjour. 
Andreia obrigado por tudo, Florence

Accueil agréable, appartement très fonctionnel, très propre. Bien situé en centre ville et près des transports en commun. Vraiment rien à redire. C'était notre première expérience en AirBnB donne envie de revenir. Pour nous cela a été un séjour fantastique.
La casa es tal como se describe en el anuncio, estupenda y muy bien ubicada. La anfitriona encantadora.Recomiendo este alojamiento sin duda, para repetir!

Departamento cómodo y muy bien ubicado.
Andreia fue muy amable antes y durante mi estadía.

Andreia est vraiment quelque de très sympathique et à l'écoute. Elle nous a tout de suite mis à l'aise et a pu répondre à toutes nos questions sur le logement mais aussi sur la ville. l'appartement très bien placé, tout près de la Gare Sao Bento. Les photos correspondent tout à fait à la réalité, appart bien agencé et très pratique. Le balcon est très appréciable et le quartier est assez calme le soir.
Gostamos muito de ficar na rua das flores da Andreia. Muito moderno, práctico e confortável. Igual como aparece nas (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendamos!

Quartier central, animé à l'extérieur mais le logement était très calme.
Normalement Andreia travaille juste en bas mais comme c'était son jour de congé c'est une amie qui nous a reçus.

Andreias Studio is on a very central and easy to reach spot! We really enjoyed having breakfast in your restaurant ;-) thanks a lot!
Also cool to have a balcony, a perfect hideout for two ;-)

We stayed at this apartment for 3 nights , it is modern with all necessary amenities, nice and clean. The main advantage is that it's in centre of historical porto most of the places you can visit in short time. Also many restaurants nearby.

Anfitriã Andreia, uma pessoa dedicada, simpática e solicita, pronta para atender suas necessidades. Tive uma estada excelente. Localização muito boa, perto de tudo para quem vai conhecer ou voltar ao Porto. Região com tudo de que se precisa, inclusive o silêncio para as noites de bons sonos. Excelente relação preço x benefícios.

Bei unserer Ankunft würden wir persönlich von Andreia empfangen und sie gab uns gleich das Gefühl, herzlich willkommen zu sein. Das Apartment liegt wie auf den Fotos erkennbar zur hinteren Seite, sodass wir von dem munteren Leben auf der wirklich schönen Rua das Flores innerhalb der Wohnung nichts mitbekommen haben. Andreia führte uns bei der Begrüßung nach oben und zeigte uns die Räumlichkeiten, welche den Eindruck bestätigen, der durch die Fotos entstanden ist: Für einen Kurztrip, wo ihr die meiste Zeit des Tages außerhalb verbringt. In der Parallelstraße überhalb der Rua das Flores befindet sich ein Supermarkt an dem wir uns mit dem nötigsten an Verpflegung für unseren Aufenthalt ausstatten konnten. Darüber hinaus gab uns Andreia viele Tipps zur Freizeitgestaltung in Porto. Sämtliche Anziehungspunkte sind aufgrund der zentralen Lage super einfach und in der Regel innerhalb von 10 - 15 Minuten Fußmarsch zu erreichen. An der angrenzenden Station Sao Bento fährt auch die Buslinie 500, welche euch in ca. 40 Minuten zum Stadtstrand in Matosinhos bringt. Wir haben die vier Tage in Porto sehr genossen und netterweise kümmerte sich Andreia am letzten Tag sogar noch darum, dass wir unser Gepäck nach dem Checkout sicher für ein paar Stunden verstauen konnten. Ich kann dieses Apartment nur wärmstens weiter empfehlen!

Andreia was an extraordinary host - she give us advices about excellent restaurant and bars, very helpful! -  and the apartment is very well located in Porto, nice and clean and it has all necessary amenities for a weekend. Thank you Andreia!

The room is exactly as on the pictures - very tidy and comfy. Everything is only a short walk away. We enjoyed our stay at Andreia´s place. She ist very nice, happy to help at any time and gives you many tips what to do in this great city. We would definitely stay at her lovely place again.

Logement parfait, très propre, lumineux, à la fois très calme et dans un quartier central et anime.
Arrangement efficace pour récupèrer les clés auprès du beau-père de andreia, qui travaille aussi dans le cafe en-dessous. Nous reviendrons avec plaisir.

Very beautiful place. Location is awesome. Andreia hel us very well and answer quick to our questions.
Just a little noisy, we heared th neighbours from the upper floor.
Very good trip, perfect for little stays in Porto.
Nice appartment in perfect location!

Le quartier est idéalement placé pour une première découverte de Porto. Andreia à été très arrangeante et même si nous ne nous sommes pas vu ses petites notes à notre attention avec les monument, bars, boutiques et autres lieux incontournables de la ville nous ont été très utiles. Je recommande chaudement.
Excelente ubicación, cerca de todo. Pudimos entrar antes de hora al apartamento lo que nos facilitó mucho el dia. Andreia es súper amable.

O apartamento é ótimo e tem uma excelente localização. Andreia foi muito solícita e prestativa, quando precisamos fomos prontamente atendidos. Recomendo bastante o apartamento, muito silencioso, bonito e agradável.

Très bel appartement conforme aux photos. Très propre et agréable. L'emplacement est vraiment idéal pour visiter Porto. 
Andréia est une hôte agréable et très disponible.
Je recommande vivement ce logement

Nous avons passés un super séjour dans l'appartement d'Andreia. C'était très propre, ça correspondait bien aux photos et Andreia est une hôte très sympathique, accueillante et arrangeante. Elle travaille dans le restaurant en bas donc c'est très pratique pour les clefs. Je vous recommande cet appartement très bien placé dans Porto ; nous avons pu faire tout à pied pratiquement !

Andreia was a great host. The room was nice and clean. It is really central in Porto and the place is hard to miss when leaving the Sao Bento train/metrostation. Just outside the appartment is the coffee house where Andreia and her husband work (and I think is also owned by them) which serves a great Pastel de Nata.

Appartement très bien situé dans Porto, très propre et lumineux. 
Les photos reflètent totalement la réalité. 
Hôte disponible. Nous avons apprécié la liste des visites à faire.
Merci pour ce super séjour !

La experiencia en FloresRooms fue estupenda. La localización inmejorable, las fotos del inmueble se ajustan exactamente a la realidad, muy acogedor y con todo lo necesario. Andreia como anfitriona fue estupenda. Sin duda volvería a este alojamiento.

Квартира удобная, удачно расположена. Балкон выходит во дворик, из которого днем доносится живая музыка (кстати, в неплохом исполнении), но после 20.00  тихо. Нам было любезно позволено раннее заселение. Хозяйка очень оперативно реагировала на все воросы, которые у нас возникали при подготовке к путешествию. пребыванием в Порту мы остались очень довольны. Спасибо!

Very nice apartment and location (the neighborhood is lively, active and cute).
Conveniently located in the heart of the city, any relevant and interesting place can  be easly reached.
Andreia is very kind and nice
Notre séjour à Porto fut extraodinaire grâce à Andreia. Superbe appartement bien situé. Je conseille vivement ce logement à prix imbattable. Attention cependant au prix du parking pour une nuit oups!

Andreia's place was perfect! The location is perfect, very close to everything! The apartment was very clean, modern and had everything we needed. I would definitely this apartment to anyone visiting Porto
Had an amazing time staying at Andrea's flat. The localization is perfect. I definitely recommend this place!

Tout c'est très bien passé. Communication et accueil parfait de la part d'Andreia. Appartement refait à neuf, petit mais très confortable et bien équipé, conforme à la description. Idéalement situé. Je recommande vivement pour un séjour à Porto.
It was really great to stay at Andreia's. The location is just perfect, the place was clean and just lovely. Thanks Andreia for being so accommodating. Definitely recommend.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement d'Andréia.
L'emplacement, la propreté, le rapport qualité-prix, les équipements tout est parfait. A signaler juste que la cabine de douche n'est pas très grande, donc pour les fortes corpulences c'est un peu juste.
Nous avons pu découvrir la ville de Porto et avons été agréablement surpris par sa grandeur, par les multiples choses à faire ou à découvrir, des bons petits restaurants à apprécier. D'autant que la vie est moins chère qu'en France. Andreia est disponible et agréable. Nous pensons revenir très bientôt dans le même appartement.
Appartement agréable que nous avons cru que nous étions dans un hôtel.  Il est bien situé et nous avons été bien reçu et équipé pour apprécié notre voyage. Merci beaucoup.

We had a great time in Porto! The apartment has a great location that is very close to the metro stop Sao Bento. We arrived in the morning and we could pick up the key of the apartment in the coffee shop next to the apartment, where we also had a coffee and ofcourse a pastei de nata!
The apartment has everything you need for a couple days in Porto. You can easily walk everywhere and if you want to go somewhere that is too far away, the metro is right in front of the apartment. 
So we would recommend this place!

The location was perfect, close to metro/train, shops, restaurants, including a perfect cafe right next door, key sites to see and the river! Andreia, our wonderful host, met us as we arrived shortly from the train. She gave us great places to visit, foods to try, and made us feel like family with her welcoming nature. She emailed to check on us during our stay and ensured that everything with our room and visit was going well. We can't wait to return to Porto and when we do, we hope to stay at Rua de Flores at Andreia's place!
L appartement était parfait et correspondait exactement à la description. Son emplacement est idéal pour visiter la ville et ses monuments et il est parfaitement équipé. Je le recommande vivement.
Andreia was lovely! She gave great recommendations and the place was perfectly located and very clean!

This apartment is perfect for a couple (or single) looking to wander around Porto. You are really in the heart of the city, right next to the São Bento train station and next to loads of little shops and cafés. We loved it. The apartment had a nice little balcony where you can eat breakfast, it looks over a courtyard that has the occasional tour group. It's super quiet, very easy to get to and Andreia is absolutely wonderful. She was around to answer any questions we had and had left a nice guide to the city, along with a map. 
We can really only say good things about it!
We enjoyed our stay at Andreia's place. The room was verry clean and beautifull located. We used the tips that she gave us when we arrived, witch was very nice and well thought of her!

Poco que decir, PERFECTO. 
Ubicación inmejorable, apartamento bonito y con detalles que hacen que todo sea más fácil. 
Si volvemos a Oporto, repetimos.

Atendimento excelente, apartamento novo com pontos turísticos próximos.

Andreia , à l'image des portugais croisés durant notre  séjour de 4 jours à Porto a été charmante et aux petits soins pour nous. Elle est disponible , joignable, facilite le séjour  grâce à sa petite liste de bienvenue avec les incontournables de Porto! Le studio est eu coeur de toutes les commodités , à quelques mètres de la gare de  Sao Bento, mais au calme. Nous y avons très bien dormi!
 Nous avons beaucoup apprécié , belle découverte pour une première expérience du Portugal! Merci encore Andréia

Localização magnífica, perfeita, perto de tudo!!! Só caminhamos a pé pra tudo, não utilizamos metro e ônibus para nada... o apartamento é impecavelmente limpo e organizado com tudo o que precisamos. A Andreia então meu Deus, que anfitriã maravilhosa!!! Nos recebeu com mapa e sugestões de lugares para visitar. Além disso durante os 3 dias de estadia nos ajudou em tudo o que precisamos, a qualquer hora do dia. MUITO OBRIGADA Andreia pela oportunidade. E pode ter certeza que voltaremos e certamente indicaremos seu apartamento para amigos e familiares. Abraços. Fernanda e Leonardo.

Andreia es una anfitriona excepcional, todo estaba perfecto, también nos dió un mapa de la ciudad y un listado de sitios a los que ir, todo un detalle! Volvería sin dudarlo, además la ubicación era perfecta!

There isn't one unique thing I can complain of. Andreia was very kind and provided us with great info on what to see and where to eat. She kept on asking if there was anything that we need and to reach out to her at any time.

When it comes to location... Perfect! The best location to stay for sure.

The Apartment was as described. Very nice and clean with everything that is needed.

Do recommend for sure and will be back.

I can't possibly immagine a better place to visit to stay while visitong Porto. The apartment is located in the very center of the city. Nonetheless it is very quite and calm. You couldn't ask for anything better.
A estadia foi muito agradável! O quarto estava impecavelmente limpo e era super acolhedor. A Andreia foi muito simpática à chegada e esteve sempre disponível. A localização é perfeita, perto de tudo!

Só tenho a dizer bem da Andreia, pois esteve sempre disponível e é uma simpatia. A localização não poderia ser melhor e o apartamento é muito confortável e estava super limpo. Tudo funcionou muito bem e sem duvida que recomendo. Obrigada Andreia :)

The perfect location of the apartment! The windows open on to the yard, so it was quiet. Cleaning  -  every 3 days. The apartment has everything you need except cookers. Quick Wi-Fi. Very clean and comfortable.

Although I met her only at check out, Andreia was a great host, she seems really care that everything is ok during the stay. The apartment is essential but I had everything I needed.  The location is excellent, few steps away from Sao Bento station but very quite, facing an internal cohort. 
I definitely reccomend Andreia and her apartment!
5 estrelas!

Nous avons passé 5 nuits dans le logement d'Andreia pour un séjour touristique à Porto. Le logement est idéalement situé dans un quartier animé et proche des transports en commun et des commerces. L'appartement est conforme à la description et il est en parfait état. Nous recommandons le logement d'Andreia.

Great location in the city centre just by the main train station and airport link. Easy, clean, well insulated and modern, with good views. Comfy bed, good service and communication. Would definitely recommend.

everything is perfect.
one of the best airbnb experience.
andreia is very friendly and gave us lots of help.
the house is perfect,location, condition……
do recommend to everyone who wanna travel Porto!!!

Andreia foi uma anfitriã excepcional: apartamento maravilhoso! Confortável, amplo, silencioso, próximo a tudo e ao lado da estação central. Melhor escolha, impossível!

We had a wonderful stay at Andreia's place. It is very centrally located in the downtown area extremely close to Sao Bento station. There are many restaurants and shops close by. Despite the central location, we had no issues with noise at night. The apartment was very clean and accurately reflected in the pictures. It served our purposes very well. Because we visit in the winter, the apartment was slightly cold, but Andreia provided an additional heater which was enough. 

Andreia was also very responsive to our requests and issues. We even allowed us to store our luggage at her workplace after our check out, which was so nice of her. 

Overall, would highly recommend the apartment complex!
Impeccable!! Is a super nice place and hostess. Andreia is very attentive and helpful, fully recommend! Thank you for everything.
Andreia a été très sympathique et nous a bien accueilli au téléphone! Emplacement idéal pour découvrir Porto.

Apartamento otimo! Equipado com itens necessarios para uma estadia confortavel. Muito bem localizado, numa das principais rua do Porto, nao sendo necessario utilizar transporte publico em nenhum dia que ficamos na cidade, apesar de estar situado em frente a Estacao Sao Bento. A Andrea foi uma otima anfitria, muito gentil e disposta a nos auxiliar a qualquer momento. Gostamos muito da experiencia e recomendamos.
Appartement propre et confortable très bien situé. Logement calme, qui correspond bien aux photos. Aucun problème particulier.
房子位置超级赞就在são Bento地铁站旁边｡旁边有超市和早餐馆｡离景点也是很近｡唯一的不足可能是家里没有锅没法做饭｡但还是不错的!

The apartment was excellently located and impeccable. 100% recommendable
Our stay in Porto was fantastic! Great location, very clean, it has everything you need. Andreia is a wonderful host :)

Andreia's apartment was perfect for exploring Porto! It's located close to everything, and in a lovely area. It's clean, comfortable, and her friend who met me for a late check in was kind enough to help me get my bags inside.  I had a lovely stay and would visit again!

Great apartment! Very good location, close to the train station, the bridge, the street down to the riverside. The place is really quiet despite the fact that it's on a busy street. The linen and towels are just like in a hotel room. I highly recommend this place to visit Porto.

Awesome location! Right next to the Sao Bento train station and right in the middle of the city. Overall great place to stay for a short trip. I definitely recommend :)

Great location near sao bento station, tons of restaurants nearby, lovely balcony and very clean apartment! I would definitely stay at Andreia's again! Her father in law helped get us in and everything we needed was prepared including a list of must see locations and restaurants! Great spot-

Very cute little studio right in the heart of Porto- could not be more conveniently located next to Sao Bento train station, but still safe and quiet at night. Apartamento acogedor, en pleno centro de Oporto.

Absolutely the best appartment to visit Porto :  ideal location in city center close to everything , clean, quiet, nice ...

Le logement m'a semblé très bien isolé car en plus de ne pas entendre les voisins la température intérieure était idéale au vue de la chaleur dehors.

Andreia nous a parfaitement accueillis. Elle s'est adaptée à notre heure d'arrivée puisqu'elle travaille juste à côté. L'appartement nous a immédiatement plu. The location of the apartment is perfect! You can reach everything by walking and on the other site it's really quite because the apartment is in a backyard. Andreia's place is wonderful - the ideal location within walking distance of all the main attractions and literally on the most wonderful stretch of cafes and restaurants.  Andreia was efficient, excellent communication, and her place is set up wonderfully - lots of space!  I had a really great stay in Porto and highly recommend her lovely apartment.

Apartamento muy centrico, cerca de la estacion de tren.

L'appart est calme, propre agréable avec son petit balcon.

Andreia’s place is really nice. It’s in such a good location, the Riveira is only five minutes walk away. The apartment is really nice too, everything was in good condition when we were there. Obrigado por tudo! Was amazing! The location was just on point, very central. The flat Was just what we needed. Communication with the hostess was easy and will definitely stay by her Airbnb again! My wife was very happy so its a winner

Melhor localização impossível junto à estação São Bento e aos principais pontos turísticos. 
O apartamento é todo equipado, mobiliado, limpo, extremamente agradável.
Tudo impecável!
A recepção da Andreia foi maravilhosa. Ela nos passou ótimas dicas que tornou nossa estadia ainda melhor. 
Caso volte para Porto, sem dúvida ficaremos hospedados no mesmo apartamento

Je overnacht hier vanwege de locatie. Alles is op loopafstand. Verder was het appartement keurig schoon. Andreia reageerde zeer snel via chat. Daarbij gaf ze een lijst met bezoek en eet tips. Echt een aanrader!

Appartement très bien situé, les principales visites peuvent facilement se faire à pieds.
Metro et gare juste à côté de l’appartement. Facile d’accès depuis l’aéroport.
Appartement très propre!
Rien à redire!

Really really recommend this room to all of you! Quite clean, cozy and quiet even at the heart of the central. Good facilities provided. Convenient public transportation and nice restaurants very nearby. To be honest, if i have chance to visit Porto again, would definitely choose this without any doubts!
Bem localizado, super limpo e confortável.

What can I say about Andreia's place.  Outstanding value, great location, extremely clean, and a very friendly host.  Pretty much everything I had hoped for when I booked the place.  I highly recommend this lovely studio for singles or couples.

O espaço é excelente, muito bem cuidado, tudo funciona, confortável e de fácil acesso para vários pontos de interesse. Fica literalmente à frente da estação São Bento, o que facilita demais a chegada. Andreia foi super atenciosa, inclusive deixando uma lista de pontos turísticos, restaurantes próximos e etc. Recomendo e certamente tentarei me hospedar novamente aí numa volta ao Porto.

A acomodação da Andreia é excelente. Simples mas ampla, incrivelmente limpa e melhor localizada ainda. Os pequenos cuidados estavam presentes, e que bem que me senti no quentinho deste quarto! Ainda que no centro da cidade e a 2 minutos da estação de São Bento, sentimo-nos calmos e protegidos da movimentação desta cidade.
It is a very nice place to stay for two people. It is in the center of the city easy to get with metro. The room was very clean and the host very nice.

Appartement magnifiquement bien placé dans Porto.
La rua das Flores est une rue centrale très agréable avec de nombreux petits restaurants à proximité.
Possibilité de tout visiter à pied (30 minutes de marche maximum)
Propre, fonctionnel et bien agencé, seul petit bémol la cuisine qui est un peu en-deça car il manque des plaques ou un vrai four.
Andreia est une hôte très attentionnée, réactive sur Airbnb et disponible rapidement pour l'enregistrement.

Excelente lugar, muito limpo e agradável, exatamente como na foto. A localização é ótima, e apesar da rua ser movimentada o lugar é silencioso. Andreia me respondeu prontamente a todas minhas mensagens e no check in foi eficiente.
Very good locality
La ubicación es inmejorable, todo estaba muy limpio y Andreia estuvo muy atenta a todo lo que necesitamos. 100% recomendable.
Great location,clean and beatiful place

Andreia is a fabulous host and is extremely organized for our arrival. She was very generous with her and her aunts time (her aunt checked us in) and gave us many tips for seeing the city and getting around. The place is in the best possible location in Porto and near everything.
Could not recommend enough staying with her, thanks again.

Andreia was a great host, had our apartment ready before check in time and gave us lots of useful information. The apartment was very clean and in a very good location right around the corner from the main square. Would definitely recommend to others.

It was the perfect place to stay in porto thanks to its location in the city, its proximity to every area (historic, night clubs and bars, restaurants. Moreover, the place is really confortable, clean and modern. 

We really enjoyed our stay thanks to andrea s advice and its reactivity to answer our questions throughout our stay
Um apartamento super bem localizado. É limpo e agradável.

너무나 훌륭한 아파트였습니다.
아파트 위치는 지하철 역에서 도보 2분 이내 거리에 위치해 있고, 각종 관광지에서
정말 가까워서 여행자에게는 최고의 위치였습니다.
아파트 관리자는 친절했고, 정말 빠르게 응답을 해줘서 전혀 불편함 없이 지낼 수 있었습니다.
아파트 내부 또한 청결했고, 따뜻했으며 정말 편안했습니다.
만약 다시 포르투를 방문할 경우 또 이곳에서 머무르고 싶습니다.
마지막날 전기 문제로 조금 불편했으나, 감수할 수 있는 수준의 불편함이어서
불만은 없었습니다.

Apartment with a balcony to the yard and therefore it is quiet, the entrance is from the main street but there is no window on the main street. Location is the same center - metro, bus, train is a few steps - going down to the river you have an old town with charming streets and beautiful views, going up the road you have restaurants, cafes, bookshop Lello, places that are recommended.
Contact with Andreia was perfect, she was always available by email or SMS and she provided us with all travel information and places to visit. 
The apartment looks like in the pictures.

Si vous voulez visiter la ville à pieds l'emplacement central est idéal. Plein centre ville historique. Vraiment parfait. Chambre d'une propreté impeccable avec une petite cuisine.
A recommandé vivement.
El lugar es hermoso, muy cómodo y bien ubicado. Andreia es muy simpática y fue muy amable siempre, estuvo muy atenta en todo momento. Recomiendo este lugar y espero volver!!!

I highly recommend the apartment! It was cleaned meticulously, and has a absolutely central location. Ideal in walking distance to all the different locations throughout the city. 
The communication with our host was very kind & welcoming and messages were responded super fast. 
Check in was a breeze and got many tipps on restaurants, bars, sightseeing spots, shopping etc, which we tried out and can confirm that the tips are really worth it. 
All in all it was a perfect stay and made the trip very memorable.
Thank you so very much!
The apartment was very clean, well located and Andreia was very kind. My parents recommend this apartment.
O espaço é ótimo, com tudo que você precisa para passar alguns dias. Está muito bem localizado, em frente ao trem e ao Metrô. Foram dias muito agradáveis no Porto.

Wonderful apartment central located with a nice balcony, very spacious and with a  coffee machine for wonderful mornings! São Bento station, cathedral Sé as well as other attractions are 10-15 min walking.

Wonderful place in the heart of the city. Very clean with a sweet printout explaining all the cool places to see and eat. Super easy to communicate with. Would highly recommend to anyone traveling in this price range.
Perfect location with all the main sights walking distance. Metro right outside as well as busses with connections to the rest of the city. Would stay again!
Отличная квартирка в самом центре Порту! Рекомендую!
Jolie appartement, idéalement situé. Accueil très sympathique.

This place is a steal! You could not ask for a much better location. Restaurants, wine and shops are all within walking distance.

Andreia went above and beyond to ensure that we had a great stay in Porto and is easy to get in touch with. If I am ever back, I will definitely stay at one of her properties.

O apartamento de Andreia é muito bem localizado, a poucos passos da estação São Bento. Limpo, bem equipado e silencioso. 
Numa próxima viagem a Porto, com certeza me hospedarei aí.
Local limpo, cama cómoda e acima de tudo a melhor localização do Porto.
Un piso pequeño y acogedor. Ubicación inmejorable. La comunicación con Andreia muy facil y rápida. Repetiría sin duda. Gracias!

1. 포르토의 중심이라 공항에서 이동해 올 때 외에는 모두 도보로 이동할 정도로 위치가 좋아요. 2. 집 입구는 사오벤토역 정말 중심거리 인데 집 방향은 안쪽이라 놀라울 정도로 조용했어요 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 3. 깨끗해요. 하우스키퍼가 미리 짐을 맡아주셔서 감사했어요. 포르토에서 혼자 또는 가까운 사람과 지내기에 아주 좋아요.  굳이 아쉬운 점을 찾는다면 커피머신과 캡슐이 조금 아쉬웠고,  전신 거울이 없어서 조금 불편했어요. 그렇지만 다시 포르토를 방문한다면 또 머물꺼에요! 고맙습니다.

This room is amazingly situated and we’ll maintained.  I would suggest it for anyone who like us want a clean room to sleep in a great location.  Would recommend the room to a friend.

The host has late check in fees (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) € after (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) ) so it’s definitely better if you get there early.

A localização é ótima! O apartamento estava como nas fotos e a comunicação com Andreia também foi muito prática. Precisei deixar malas para realizar o checkin e deu tudo certo. Uma excelente hospedagem!

Idéalement situé pour visiter Porto. Tout peut se faire à pied.  Des taxis sont disponibles à la gare Sao Bento qui est tout près, ça a été pratique pour nous qui devions se rendre à l'aéroport après notre séjour. L'appartement est bien lumineux et propre. Andreia répond rapidement, c'est apprécié. À recommander !

여러모로 만족했던 숙소예요. 일단 위치가 정말 상벤투역에서 고꾸라지면 코닿을 거리였구요, 어디든 걸어다니기 짱 좋은 위치였습니다!
포르토 자체가 쪼끄매서 계속 왔다갔다 숙소 자주 들렀네요ㅎㅎ Andrea는 직접 만나지 못했만 이모분께서 대신 체크인 도와주셔서 어려움없었구요, 메세지 응답도 바로바로 해줬습니다.
숙소 상태와 침구도 깨끗했고 집 방향은 상벤투역을 등지고 있는 방향이라 중심지임에도 조용했어요~ 아 그리고 주방에 포트와인 한병이 선물로 있더라구요ㅠㅠ 감동.. 그리고 관광지, 주변에 갈만한 레스토랑과 식료품점, 약국 등 필요한 지역 정보 리스트를 손수 만들어 주셨는데 매우 유용했습니당. 다만 주방에 가스레인지가 없어서 뭔가를 조리해먹을 순 없었어요ㅠㅠ 전자렌지는 있으니 냉동식품 정도는 괜찮을듯해요!
엘리베이터도 있어서 짐옮기기도 편했고 무엇보다 같은 건물 1층에 맛있는 에그타르트집이 있어서 하루에 3번씩 출석체크 했슴다^^.. 다음에 와도 꼭 묵고싶네요!
Appartement très agréable, donnant sur une place piétonne au calme avec balcon, très appréciable car situé dans le centre ville, juste à côté d'une station de métro et de la gare.

Studio très bien situé (central) et très propre.
Communication facile et accueil sympathique. Andreia nous a laissé une liste de bonnes adresses pour le week end.
Très bon séjour!
perfect location and a beautiful flat

Studio extrèmement bien placé dans le centre ville de Porto.
Le balcon donne sur une place piétonne donc très tranquille.
Tous les équipements sont bien là et pratiques.
Nous n'avons pas eu la chance de rencontrer Andreia mais l'accueil s'est très bien passé.

A bientôt !
상벤투 옆 바로 앞에 위치한 최고의 숙소였어요. 조용하고 깔끔한 분위가가 좋았어요.

Lieu très agréable, donnant sur une petite cours au calme. Très largement suffisant et bien situé. 

Petites attentions d’Andréia très appréciées et utiles

Porto is a very lively city, the apt has a very good location, next to train station and metro, as well as in the heart of the old town. Andreia was very nice and left us tips and the communication overall was very good - thank you.

A small thing to keep in mind, the apt is well isolated from outside but the walls are thin and you can hear others in the night - for light sleepers might be a problem.

Excellent location in the middle of everything you would want to see in Porto. We were surprised at how perfect the location was. The apartment was clean, Andreia was absolutely wonderful, and our stay was wonderful. Obrigado!
Precioso apartamento, nuevo y en el centro, centro. Andreia nos dejó 2 hojas con información que nos vino muy bien. Altamente recomendable.

I really enjoyed the apartment, especially the balcony and the little 'kitchen'. It was all very clean and tidy and I found everything I needed. The apartment is very centrally located but not to noisy. Everything worked out very well with Andreia, so I can just thank her for hosting me! I can definitely recommed the apartment.
Greatly located flat at the core of Porto, close to all amenities and places of interest and sparkling clean. Very attentive host. Many thanks Andreia!

Nous avons passé un très chouette séjour à porto ! L'appartement est très bien situé, très propre et la petite terrasse dedans sur un petit marche la journée est très agréable.

Malheureusement nous n'avons pas eu de chance, l'immeuble en face était en plein de travaux, difficile de faire des grasses matinées !
Place is in a great location in the centre of town, clean and had basic kitchen utensils. I would stay here again for the convenience.

We hebben een heel fijn verblijf gehad in de studio van Andreia. Het appartement is schoon, leuk ingericht en van alle gemakken voorzien. De locatie, pal tegenover het centraal station São Bento, is ideaal. Van hieruit is de stad goed te ontdekken, zowel te voet als per bus/metro/trein. 

Andreia is een fijne Airbnb hostes. Ze reageert snel op berichten en denkt goed mee. Zo waren wij 's ochtends al vroeg gearriveerd in Porto en zaten we met onze bagage. Eigenlijk konden we pas om 15:00 uur inchecken, maar van Andreia heeft ervoor gezorgd dat we de bagage al konden droppen in het appartement. 

Wij hebben een superfijne tijd gehad! En echte aanrader voor eenieder die Porto wil leren kennen en ontdekken!

Andreia's place is clean and comfortable for 2 persons. It is also located in the center of the city but it still is very quiet. She was  quick to respond and cover our need. All and all a place i would definitely recommend.

Our stay in Adreias flat was very nice. It is really central and you can go everywhere by foot. When we came the flat was perfectly clean and the check in was really easy. The communication with Andreia was very good. Our plane was late and we arrived after 12 pm, it was no problem to check in. The only thing that was a little bit disturbing was a building site directly next to us. We weren't told about it and it was very loud all day from 8 am to 5 pm.
Alojamiento excelente, impecable y situación inmejorable. Recomendado 100%.
Die Lage ist perfekt! Zentraler geht es nicht, wir haben alles im Porto zu Fuß erkundigt. Das Appartement war super sauber und alles hat problemlos geklappt. Jederzeit gerne wieder!

Andreia's apartment is in perfect location, right in the center, near train, metro and bus station, with famous attractions within  walking distance. the room is exactly as described, which is nice for one or two people to stay. Andreia is very nice and quickly responded, and gives helpful advices about restaurants and sightseeings. highly recommended for people travelling to Porto!
Perfect location, in the heart of Porto, right next to metro station. Exactly what you need. Very nice suggestions from Andreia and always quick response. Totally recommend

Excelente localização, perto de tudo (metrô, bons restaurantes,sorveterias,bares,pontos turísticos), extremamente limpo e confortável . O único inconveniente foi o barulho da obra no prédio ao lado (som de britadeira das 08:00 às 18:00).

Appartement très bien situé pour visiter Porto et très propre conformément aux photos ! La communication est très simple avec Andreia. Seul gros bémol les travaux de l’immeuble d’à côté qui font beaucoup de bruit et vibrer l’appartement ce qui nous obligeait à le quitter dès 8h (andreia avait noté ce point dans le descriptif mais nous avions sous estimé l’importance des travaux)

emplacement idéal, a deux pas de la gare et du métro la plupart des sites a visiter se trouvent a moins de dix minutes à pied.
studio propre, très bon accueil.
Segunda vez que fico nesse apartamento porque é muito bem localizado. Recomendo.
Appartement très bien situé, très bien équipé et superbement bien géré.

Great location - right outside sao bento station and bang outside many many eateries. All locations are a very close walk from this place.
Anreia is warm n friendly and will provide easy guidance, local tips etc about the place.
Wifi is good.
The room has a very warm n cosy feel to it with all ameneties.
Thanks Andreia for the bottle of wine you gave us on our arrival.
Would highly recommend this place.
PS- theres is a single flight of steps so for old people or people who cant climb stairs - you may want to rethink.

방 넓고 엄청 좋아요!!
위치도 상벤투역 바로 앞이고 어딜가든 걸어다닐수 있어요.
선물로 와인한병을 줫는데 술을 안좋아해서 놔두고 왓네요. 강추합니다!!
Thank you Andreia

저녁무렵에 가서 부모님께서 우리를 맞이해주셨는데 정말 좋은 분이셨다. 상벤투역 근처에 위치해서 어딜가도 힘들면 집으로 돌아올 수 있었다. 수도원과 힐가든을 문제없이 다리건너 쉽게 갈수 있어서 좋았다. 청결을 걱정한다면 전혀 문제없을 정도로 깨끗하다. 심지어 1층을 오르고 나면 엘리베이터가 있어서 지치고 돌아왔을때 유용했다. 커피와 와인은 호스트분이 제공해주셨다. 또 체크아웃날 오후 4시에 포르투를 떠나야해서 그때까지 짐을 맡겨도 되냐고 물었더니 흔쾌히 된다고 했다. 구뤈뒈 왼쥐 모루궷쥐뫈 싹아지가 읍었돵 우릐눈 문율 분몽희 좜규고 괐눈뒈 유뤼과 확쉴하돠눈 둣의 츄귱휐돠 붐몸님은 줳으쉰뒈 앤둘이야의 맬튜과 줘굼 줴슈웞당 문제없이 좋은 여행을 하는데 도움을 주는 숙소였다! 위치.청결도를 중요시한다면 추천한다.

Thank you! We had a great stay!
The appartement is located very good and it is very close to the metro.
You can visit all sightseeing spots and a lot of good restaurants by foot. 
We liked the area the apartment.
The bedroom is bigger than expected and the flat is very very clean! There was everything we needed. 
Andreia is a great host, she helped us with everything at any time.

Lo mejor es la ubicación. Me sorprendió que estando en una calle tan céntrica y transitada, por la noche no había un solo ruido. 
Solo creo que puede ser un poco fría en invierno.

위치, 룸 컨디션, 청결도, 가격까지 모든것이 완벽했어요 
피드백도 바로바로 해줘서 편했고 짐도
흔쾌히 맡아줬어요
포르투에 다시 간다면 재방문할 의사 100%에요
다만, 옆건물이 지금 공사중이에요
아침 8시반부터 쿵쿵소리, 드릴소리가 끊이질 않아요 오후에 쉬려고 잠시 숙소 들어갔다 오히려 두통이 나서 나왔어요
하루종일 밖에 계실 분은 상관없어요
저처럼 중간중간 숙소에서 쉬실 분은 공사중 여부 확인하시는게 좋을듯요
그것만 빼면 너무 만족해요
Great apartment in an exceptionally good location!

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans ce petit studio , très bien situé au centre de Lisbonne, à 2 pas d’une station de métro centrale, très propre et très bien équipé.
Nous recommandons vivement pour un couple qui comme nous n’avions pas de voiture.
Magnifica ubicación y limpieza. Tienes  todo lo necesario.
Beautiful flat, clean, and great location!!

El departamento esta a metros de la estación  San Bento, cerca de todo lo turistico. Muy limpio, comodo, amplio. No tiene cocina, solo calentador de agua  y microondas. Hay que subir un tramo de escalera hasta el ascensor. Recomendable

The Apartment is super central, you can reach everything in Porto by foot and a Metro station is also right around the corner. So you get there from the airport very easy, too.
The apartment is very clean and has everything like described. Also the communication with Andreia via chat worked pretty well.

The apartment is perfectly located just nearby the São Bento metro station. Moreover, there is a wonderful confeiteria (Typical Portuguese restaurant) where you can have good and cheap breakfast !

Even if I did not have the chance to meet Andreia, she was very responsive and provided all the information we needed.
The apartment is very nice and clean. The location is great, everything is near.  Even though the breakfast is not included, there was coffee, tea, sugar, olive oil, vinegar and salt.
Andreia was the most wonderful host. So communicative and kind. The location of the flat is perfect and it had everything I needed for my stay. Would definitely recommend!
Nice, clean apartment in a fantastic location. Very close to the train station and in the heart of the city. The location made our trip an absolute blast.

Perfect location, right in de center of Porto in from of train and metro station, with all the famous attractions within walking distance. The apartment is as described, super clean and has everything you need for a short stay. Communication with Andreia was perfect, quick response and helpful.
Great place, clean and cozy. Amazing location!
Location was perfect! Cozy airbnb and would def. recommend.
Nice apartment, perfect location, good communication with Andreia. Four stars instead of five only because the apartment was pretty cold. But hey, it is January.

Perfeito! Sou brasileira e foi a primeira vez que fui a Porto com meu noivo que é espanhol. Tudo perfeito, muito limpo e bonito, a localização não poderia ser melhor, em uma das ruas mais importantes de Porto, muitos restaurantes perto e pontos turísticos, pode chegar a qualquer lugar andando! Perfeito, atendimento da proprietária Andreia perfeita, muito (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza      reservaríamos outra vez. Obrigada.

Andreia and her family quite literally came to our rescue when we got stuck in the elevator of the building (something we were assured never happens) and we’re so kind and accommodating during the check-in process. The location is ideal for getting all over the city - it’s in the middle of it all! We only took a star off because the mattress was quite hard and left us sore in the morning.
Tudo excelente! Anfitriã muito disponível e simpática, apartamento óptimo, mesmo junto a S. Bento. Recomendo!
위치가 엄청 좋았어요 .  루이스 다리,렐루서점 등 명소 까지 도보 10분 정도이고요, 숙소는 깨끗했고 테라스가 있어 쉬기 좋았습니다.
위치 청결 룸컨디션 모두 좋았어요

위치가 너무너무 좋아서 잠깐 들렸다 나가기도 좋았습니다.
겨울이여서 밤에 잘땐 쌀쌀할때도 있었지만 저는 괜찮았어요!
다만 아직 공사소리가 들려서 조금 아쉬웠습니다
봄이나 가을에 오면 테라스에서 맥주나 커피한잔하기 좋을것같아요
Cozy room, great location near Sao Bento station

name: ~Ao Lele~ Flying Cloud
summary: Tucked in emerald treetops, on the far western edge of a natural reserve, a cedar cabin outlooks the native rain forest 1.4 miles (2.2km) from Nāhuku (Thurston Lava Tube) in Hawaiʻi Volcanoes National Park. This sojourn allows one a presence with the environment, to embark on adventures around the island, and be at ease afterward. Your occasional companions include moonlit mist-laden trades, the subtle glow of the Milky Way, and peaceful morning light as melodic birds dart about the lanai.
space: An alluring and thought-provoking hop to the misty mountain, from Hilo or Kona, will bring you to the edge of a lush and verdant rain forest where the cabin dwells. Follow a stairway to the lanai, then passage to the entry, kitchen and living space. A second flight leads high aloft to a king bed, half bath and musings of forest and sky.
description: Tucked in emerald treetops, on the far western edge of a natural reserve, a cedar cabin outlooks the native rain forest 1.4 miles (2.2km) from Nāhuku (Thurston Lava Tube) in Hawaiʻi Volcanoes National Park. This sojourn allows one a presence with the environment, to embark on adventures around the island, and be at ease afterward. Your occasional companions include moonlit mist-laden trades, the subtle glow of the Milky Way, and peaceful morning light as melodic birds dart about the lanai. An alluring and thought-provoking hop to the misty mountain, from Hilo or Kona, will bring you to the edge of a lush and verdant rain forest where the cabin dwells. Follow a stairway to the lanai, then passage to the entry, kitchen and living space. A second flight leads high aloft to a king bed, half bath and musings of forest and sky. The sublime of nature and place of restorative tranquility within the native rain forest.  We value, respect, and are considerate with our community and our commons.
neighborhood_overview: The sublime of nature and place of restorative tranquility within the native rain forest.  We value, respect, and are considerate with our community and our commons. Sunday mornings, the Volcano Farmer's Market will connect you with the village characters.  (The most current and accurate weather conditions in Volcano are found by BEING HERE, or search for weather station KHIVOLCA2 if no can). There is an outdoor security camera and caring neighbors.
notes: Cabins are get-aways. As such, there is no TV. Internet/Wi-Fi and Bluetooth are provided as well as music, books, peace, quiet, a kitchen to thoughtfully prepare food with conversation or...  just enjoy a soak in the tub

reviews.comments: The home and host were everything we could ask for. Spotlessly clean, well furnished and set in a scenic environment. A restful, serene environment, highly recommended.

Avid Airbnb-ers, we have stayed in some remarkable places, but this was by far the best. And the fact that it was a 5 minute drive from Volcano park was the icing on the cake. Mike is a real gentleman, informative, kind, and easy to contact. We will not forget the cherished experience he afforded. 


We particularly enjoyed the cabin's  rare blend of rustic charm and meticulously maintained, modern elegance. The beautiful wood interior with exposed beams, light scent of cedar, old-fashioned fireplace, and free-standing antique tub, all made the cabin incredibly charming. The wrap-around porch was not only scenic, but very quiet and mosquito free. It was a wonderful place to chat in the evenings, read selections from the bookshelf, and to enjoy the delicious breakfast items provided, including fresh papaya. Since the cabin resides at the end of the residential area, the only thing visible for miles from the back porch was lush, pristine forest. The cabin's enveloping sense of privacy was relaxing and romantic. 

With respect to the cabin's modern appeal, where does one begin? Even the toaster lowered the bread automatically. One can enjoy coffee prepared by three different methods, including French press, and Mike made sure we had ample amounts of freshly ground coffee. The stainless steel fridge was packed with complementary goodies as well. Being expert snackers, we were quite pleased. 

This understood, the modern conveniences went far beyond food. We enjoyed being able to dim the lights just the right amount in each room to create the desired ambiance. The king-sized bed in the loft was incredibly comfortable and featured three types of pillows, including a memory foam option. But the aspect of our stay we liked the most had to do with the modern architecture of the cabin itself. The walls of the A-frame design, both behind the bed and in front of it, feature large windows with breathtaking views of the forest. As a result, the typical distinction between interior and exterior does not apply. The effect was magical. Waking up in the morning, we were in awe. 

Thanks again for everything, Mike.

Mike's cabin in the clouds was top-notch! It was everything we hoped it would be based on the pictures. It was immaculate and stocked with some very nice surprises. Enjoyed the lanai and slept soundly in the middle of a thunderstorm! Highly recommend this spot. Thanks Mike, good meeting you!

Mike is single handidly putting the BnB back in AirBnB. The cabin itself is super charming and impeccably clean and cared for, but it's Mike's hospitality and amenities that really make this experience next level. Could not recommend this place or this host more!

Mike was amazing and the cabin was incredible. Absolutely spotless and the view from the lanai looking into 12 miles of forest was the perfect backdrop for a relaxing getaway. By far the best experience I've had using Airbnb. I accidentally left my charger and he mailed it out the next day. Would absolutely recommend and will definitely be staying there again!

Mike was a fantastic host and with such a lovely place!  Everything in the cabin was high end and comfortable.  Mike even had fresh papaya cut for us, fresh juices, and local coffee and tea.  I wish we had stayed more than one night!  We would definitely stay here again and would even pay more for the stay. Thank you Mike!

Mike is a lovely human with a lovely home! His communication was top notch, as was the cabin. It's clear how much thought and care he put into making a warm & welcoming space. Mike didn't miss a single detail--truly! There were maps to navigate the vast expanse of the Big island's Volcano park; filtered water by the bedside; beautiful Hawaiian music playing from the Bluetooth speaker; local coffee & produce; headlamps to use in the volcano caves, etc (*this list is far more extensive). 

Mike had a warmth about him you could immediately feel--and not the, 'I feel obliged to be pleasant', but a feeling of true hospitality and generosity. I live on Oahu and will certainly rent from Mike again in the near future!
Amazing place in an outstanding location. This cabin is beautiful, it had everything we needed and the attention to details that Mike put into it is incredible. We can't wait to go back!

Pictures really don't do enough justice to the cabin in the clouds. The entire property made us feel like we were in the middle of a beautiful jungle (with no mosquitos!). Mike really put a lot of wonderful touches to the house that made us feel special and right at home. This is a must stay if you want to visit the Volcanos!
Feels like a tree house (a NICE tree house) in a tropical rainforest, very serene

The house is easy to access from the Volcano neighborhood street, but this BandB happens to be the last house on the street. Its totally private, with acres of Hawaiin jungle surrounding it. 

We could not believe how modern the house was. In Hawaii, a lot of the houses are older and they have outdated furniture. This house was modern with beautiful furniture, gorgeous floors, and beautiful bathtub/sinks/counters. There are so many windows. There is an L-shaped wrap around deck that is massive. We spent almost all of our time sitting out there on the comfortable patio furniture, listening to the jungle, drinking our freshly prepared 100% Hawaiin coffee that our host provided. (Also, we didnt get a single mosquito bite. We never even saw any.) 

Speaking of what the host provided for us: coffee, tea, oats, pancake mix, butter, sugar, syrup, fresh jam, eggs, orange juice, milk, chocolate, yogurt, and fruit. We were amazed. 

Every detail of this house, each room, is modern, cozy and designed to make you feel like you are on a luxurious vacation. This place is 5 stars. We wished we'd known how awesome it was going to be, and stayed more than one night.

This is a hidden gem that far exceeded expectations! The owner, Mike, was prompt and thorough with all communications and incredibly informative about directions, dining recommendations, and local attractions. His love of not only the cabin, but the local community and environment was evident in every facet of our stay. From the locally grown coffee, fresh baked banana bread, and organic whole milk to the unique iron claw bath tub, cozy cotton bath robes, and natural rainwater supply, every nook and cranny of this endearing cabin reflected Mikes attention to detail and reverence for nature. This true getaway will bring total relaxation secluded in a rain forest where the pitter-patter of rain on a tin roof will lull you into a deep sleep only to awaken the next morning to the cool crisp air echoing with exotic bird calls. Best AirBnB experience that I have had yet!

Mir hat der Aufenthalt in Mikes Cabin ausserordentlich gefallen. Die Lage, die Ausstattung, die Sauberkeit, bequemes Bett, alles hat gestimmt. 
Mike ist sehr fürsorglich und er hat die Cabin liebevoll eingerichtet. Man spürt, dass es ihm wichtig ist, dass die Gäste sich wohl fühlen (mehrere Blumengestecke, kuscheliger Morgenmantel)). Er hat zur Benützung ausführliche Instruktionen gegeben (Papaya zum Frühstück schon vorbereitet) und war bei Fragen  erreichbar.  
Preislich ist die Cabin eher im oberen Segment, aber für eine kleine Ferien-Hütte am Rand vom Naturschutztreservat mit Blick auf den wilden Urwald mit all seinen Annehmlichkeiten eigentlich unbezahlbar.
Es kann bisweilen ziemlich kühl sein auf 1000 Fuss (?m), gegen Mittag fängt es auch häufig zu nieseln / regnen an. Hatte häufig meine Daunenjacke an, Heizungslüfter wäre bei Bedarf vorhanden. Ich habe 2 Nächte gebucht. Mit allem was es im Vulkanpark zu sehen gibt,  könnte man durchaus auch noch länger da verweilen. 

Zusätzlich ist Mike als erfahrener "Seebär" (eigenes Schiff) darauf bedacht, dass auch Kleinigkeiten stimmen, die einem das Leben erleichtern ( hawaianische Musik ab MP3 Player, grosse Bibliothek über Hawaii ( Pflanzen, Tiere, Geschichtevetc etc). Er hat zudem ein grosses Wissen über einheimische Pflanzen und Tiere, die er einem gerne weitergibt.
Er geht praktisch jeden Morgen zum Vulkan. Er hat mich spontan um 05 30 frühmorgends zum "glow"  mitgenommen (leuchten der Magma, am besten b Sonnen auf oder -Untergang sichtbar). Danach haben wir in der Militär- basis im Park gefrühstückt und über "Gott ind die Welt" gesprochen. 
Thanks for all that, dear Mike. I appreciated my stay a lot. It was wonderfull!

Mike was there to meet us when we arrived. He provided an excellent introduction and answered all our questions about places to see in the area.

This is the perfect getaway! Mike has missed no detail, from the comfort out on the lanai to the scrumptiously warm bathrobes. It is so relaxing, we didn't want to leave.
Mike的房子非常棒,屋子整体舒服极了,就像电影里拍的一样,我的老婆非常喜欢｡而且他还准备了很多食物在冰箱｡另外,Mike是一个非常棒的房东,绅士,礼貌,有耐心｡所以我们的旅行感觉很好｡5星好评!
What a great place to overnight at when visiting Volcano! Would recommend Ao Lele to anyone. Mike's house is lovely and his thoughtful touches made the stay even better.
Beautiful, secluded place, really convenient for the volcano

This was the most memorable place we stayed in Hawaii. We did feel like we were flying in the clouds.  It was a beautiful, romantic get away in the rain forest.  Mike was a great host.

Thanks!

If you want to stay anywhere on the big island, particularly by Volcano, this is the place you should stay. If you're looking at other places, trust me when I tell you that you have found the perfect place in the Flying Cloud Cabin. I don't think I have enough space to really describe just how awesome of an experience Mike helped us have, but I'll definitely try.

The location is fantastic, and about as close as you can be to Volcano park without actually staying inside it. We were able to easily make our way to some of the most remote locations of the park without having to worry about when we would get back to the cabin. 

The amenities were beyond belief. Mike provided a warm in-person greeting despite our late night arrival, and had just about everything ready that you could imagine. The fridge was well stocked with juice, jams, eggs, fruit, and a few other tasty treats ready for us to consume. He gave us a quick tour around, made sure we had an answer to all our questions, and even had two wonderfully fuzzy robes ready for us.

If you don't know what to do in Volcano, don't worry! Mike has great recommendations of what to do anywhere on the island, and gave us great ideas for where to go inside the park and around volcano as well.

If this hasn't convinced you already, I'm not sure what will. This is hands down the best place I have ever stayed. Come here, have a wonderful time, and enjoy!

Unfortunately I sgould say I made a really wrong dicision to stay at Mike's house------for just 1 inght.
My wife and I love this fantastic jouse so much and want to stay longer and longer.
A wooden house located in rain forest is my dream and Mike help me to make it true. He decorated it with amazing iterior and mardern electric facilities.
Of course, Mike himself is the point. He's so kind and was waiting for us in the raining evening even we were a little bit late. he shows us aroung the place and all free food and fruits prepared for us. Especially he show me his cool boat picture cause he knew me as a sailer. But I should say Mike is a sailing master cause he crossed Pacific for 3 times.
Mike gave us a very important suggestion that we'd better to observ the Lawa at night time even we just arriveed. Then we had a truelly impressive outlook at the top os Kilauea and took photoes over the night, incluing Starry Night Sky and Milky Way.
Now it comes the sunny morning but we shoule leave. If I will be back to Volcano, I defenitely will contact with Mike and stay here as longer as possible.
Much appreciate, dear Mike, you gave us a wonderful wedding ceremony stay. 
夏威夷之旅印象至深的一晚!  性价比极高!

Mike and his cabin were great! It was very clean and cozy. We arrived late at night and were a little worried about finding an early breakfast, but Mike stocked the fridge with fresh eggs, milk, and juice. He also had pancake mix, local tea and coffee, and fresh fruit. In fact, he was upset that a papaya was not yet ripe and he dropped off two ripe ones the next day. So nice to be abe to relax each morning and enjoy the rainforest around us. So beautiful! Also, location is awesome - minutes to the volcano crater lookout so we went each night after dinner. The cabin is a beautiful place and the effort Mike has put into it sure shows!

Unbelievable place.  Highly recommend.  Mike was a fantastic host and ensured that we had a great stay.  I honestly wish we had more time at this place.  I have stayed at a lot of Air BNBs and this was a 10/10.  If you are planning a trip to Volcano and are contemplating this place, stop!  Stay here.

We had such a wonderful time in Volcano and much of that has to do with our beautiful accommodations at Ao Lele and the extra special touches that Mike provides. From the excellent tips for visiting the park, the thorough introduction to the cabin and its amenities, and the tasty treats awaiting us, Mike went above and beyond to make our stay perfect. We were so impressed and pleased with our stay. Mahalo!

The rave reviews you read about Mike and his place are all true. Great guy, great host. Wonderful and immaculate house/cabin surrounded by giant ferns and trees, with complete privacy and only minutes away from Volcano National Park. 6 stars!

Mike's cabin was the perfect place to stay to explore Volcanoes National Park and to enjoy the peace and quiet of the jungle. My wife and I stayed for 4 nights during our honeymoon and absolutely loved it. This gave us enough time to explore VNP, drive to Kalapana and bike to the lava flow, and to just relax and enjoy the cabin. 

The location is perfect. It's less than 10 minutes from the entrance of the park and we found ourselves going early in the morning to beat the crowd and after dark to see the volcano glow from the Jagger Museum. The cabin is completely secluded but only a short drive from the highway. Just over the highway there are several restaurants and convenience stores. We really enjoyed dinner at the Kilauea Lodge. 

The cabin itself is beautiful and charming. Mike has thought of absolutely everything and was very attentive to any needs we had. We could see the sunrise from our bed and on a clear night we could see the moon and stars. The cabin can be chilly at night and the area can get cold and rainy, so pack accordingly. One night we took advantage of the fireplace which was great. 

Mike was the best airbnb host I've had and we wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.

Mike's cabin was the best sleep away from home experience we have ever had. Thank you Mike!
5* hotels cannot compete with the beautiful cabin that Mike has in front of the jungle, fully equipped to relax and enjoy the views and your company during the stay. 
It was raining and a bit cold when we stayed, so we couldn't really enjoy the terrace but the inside is just incredible!
Go there, you will not regret it!

It almost seems unfair that I can't give more than 5 stars for this stay! Mike is a passionate host that goes above and beyond to make sure you have everything you could want or need. The cabin is beautiful and peaceful and the location is perfect for hiking and exploring the volcano, which should definitely be part of any Big Island itinerary. Mahalo Mike!

Our stay at Ao Lele was fabulous! Mike is an excellent host; he met us at check in to show us around and point out all the fauna and flora in the backyard. All breakfast items were provided, plus a great selection of maps and hikes around the volcano and he island. Do remember that it can get chilly in the fall/winter! Mike had a wood fire started for us and warm robes to wear around the cabin.

From what I had read in reviews by others who had stayed at the Flying Cloud, we expected to have a good experience, but it's hard to overstate how truly fabulous it was. Mike was a warm, helpful, thoughtful host, and every detail of the cabin was amazing. It smelled good walking into it--from the cedar it's made of--and everything inside was immaculate. The photos of the cabin itself don't do justice to the space, the light, the furniture, the attention to detail.

Mike answered my numerous questions via email quickly and thoroughly, left lots of delicious food for us (yogurt, granola, fresh fruit, pumpkin bread, bagels, wonderful juices), and offered great advice about what to see and do. (Don't miss the Volcano farmer's market if you're there on a Sunday morning.)

It's a luxury to have the half-bathroom upstairs in addition to the full one downstairs. The bed was super comfortable. Mike had thought of everything: binoculars, umbrellas, flashlights, guidebooks. The cabin was spacious and cozy at once. I cannot recommend this place more highly.

Words can't describe how much we loved our stay at Mike's place! My husband and I spent our last two nights on Big Island in his cabin, and wish we would have booked longer. The cabin is just a short drive from Volcano National Park, which made is easy for us to pop over multiple times to see the lava and other attractions both during the day and at night. 

There are a number of restaurants nearby in Volcano Village, and a small convenience store for buying food. Mike provides a really nice spread for breakfast though (we had eggs, granola, yogurt, fresh papaya, english muffins, local spreads and jams, and a myriad of other things to fill us up), so chances are you won't need to buy much. Mike even dropped off a warm loaf of pumpkin bread one morning!

Mike seems to have thought of everything you could possibly need while at his place - he has binoculars, headlamps and maps available for trips to the park, lots of blankets to keep you warm, and he even offered to start a fire for us. His cabin is lovely, and bigger than it appears in the photos. This is the perfect place to stay if you want a romantic spot to relax and check out the volcano.

Mike is a delightfully pleasant and affable host with an almost heavenly place in the clouds you get the pleasure of sharing for a while. There are so many things to say here, but I'll just focus on the two most important and overarching areas of interest: the host and the home. The most accurate description I can relinquish of this host (Mike) is that he was kind, organized, informed, and impressively meticulous in his attention to detail. We actually ran into him by coincidence while out hiking the VNP trails and we were glad to share in part of a hike with him to have the chance to get to know him better. Our brief Mike-guided tour was just a nice bonus as he is an admirable conversationalist with an interesting life and is very knowledgeable of the VNP area. We have personally ranked him as our overall best host in all of our AirBnB stays to date, and that is saying a lot as we have been very fortunate to have nearly all positive experiences via AirBnB. Albeit, Mike sets the bar really high; the previous makes sense given he basically lives in the clouds in the shadow of a volcano. The home was incredible and in retrospect remains our favorite place we stayed this year on the islands of Hawaii and Maui (out of 7 other homes and/or hotels). Mike has obviously placed a lot of consideration into this offering and continues to build upon a rock solid foundation of thoughtful hosting. He easily supplies every utensil, comfort, amenity, and convenience you could expect and/or want in this upscaled cabin. There are all the expected and unexpected kitchen fixings, a small library in a large wall-shelf filled with Hawaii-centric materials, several dehumidifiers, music and lighting that just delivers a very creature-comfort cabin experience, and a slew of other add-ons provided to make life just a little easier on your trip. The interior of this house has so many fine things it's hard to list but our personal favorites were the 100-year old clawfoot tub (also functions as a standing shower), the tempur-pedic bed and ultra comfortable bedding, and last but not least the carefully selected combinations of wood all throughout the house, which make it feel like it's both somewhere old and somewhere new to its guest as well as blends the home into its earthy and forested setting just outside the glass doors. The lanai wraps around the unit and makes for an amazingly tranquil place to eat a meal or listen and watch the rain. The surrounding area is residential but spread out and Mike's place seems like it's in own little universe, tucked between the trees. We found the flying cloud was easy to find (via GPS) and an absolutely perfect spot for those looking to enjoy the VNP as its very close (<10mins) and makes for a seems-to-good-to-be-true home base. There are plenty of other things I could continue on to say in...

The best bnb experience we ever had - Mike's warm hospitality, the sound and view of the rainforest surrounding the cabin, the cabin itself (well designed, open, clean and well stocked), and the proximity to the National park.

Mike is a very friendly and warm person. His eye for detail, organized manner, and thoughtfulness comes across in so many tiny details in the cabin that will make your stay that much more comfortable. The same can be said of his communication and cabin's (Website hidden by Airbnb) was very kind of him in getting us warm pumpkin bread and papaya on the second day of our stay - which were so tasty. He also gave us helpful suggestions/information on places/hikes to visit/do and best timings for them. 

The cabin itself is beautiful with its big lanai overlooking the rainforest, and big windows bringing the outside in being the highlights for us. We enjoyed sitting out and hearing the sounds of the rainforest and the wind in the pitch dark night, sleeping to the melodious pattering of the rain on the roof, and waking up to the view of the rainforest outside your bedroom windows. The cabin has a well equipped and well stocked kitchen, which was very helpful for us as we cooked our meals. The rest of the cabin was very comfortable as well.

Thank you Mike.  We look forward to staying here again.

All of the glowing reviews about The Flying Cloud Cabin are 100% justified. Mike was an amazing host. He met us at the cabin when we arrived, told us about the area as well as anything we could possibly need to know about the cabin. He also had a stocked fridge with essentials, interesting books on the volcano, and about five different ways to make coffee. On top of that, he gave us great advice about hikes and how best to enjoy the volcano. 

The cabin itself is truly amazing. The great pictures don't even do it justice. He clearly puts so much thought and care into every detail. 

The location is perfect for seeing the volcano (an easy five minute drive to the park entrance). 

This will be one of the best AirBnbs you will ever stay at. It's pretty much that simple. Thank you for one of the best stays of our honeymoon, Mike! We will be back!
Everything is true! Mike and his cabin are unbelievable.

Reviews seem too good to be true? They're not! Mike is an extremely generous and friendly host. As soon as we entered the cabin, we felt like we were at home. The view is stunning and is the perfect place to get away from it all and recharge. Volcanoes Park is only a short drive away. 
It's clear that Mike has put much love and time into making his cabin the ultimate getaway. Many thanks to Mike for a truly beautiful stay.
Mike's place is a fantastic home base for all the Volcano National Park activities and Mike is the perfect host. It is peaceful, immaculate, well stocked and homey. I highly recommend staying here.
Mike's place is wonderful,  immaculate and extremely well equipped.   Attention to detail and comfort incredible.   A 5 star rating.

Absolutely perfect stay. We loved the cabin and it was perfect for a weekend getaway to see Volcanoes National Park. The place was also fully stocked. Mike seems to have thought of everything, even providing breakfast! We look forward to coming back next time we're on the Big Island.

Mike's house is clean,tidy and high-tech,everything was well prepared,just the same as the pictures show.Mike is very considerate,gives us suggestions for the adventures in big island which are very helpful.Highly recommended,you just can't miss it!

This place is a slice of tropical paradise totally unlike the west side of the island from where we had come. The tree ferns off the back porch beckon to the 25000 acres of tropical rainforest beyond. Bask in the light of the full moon coming through the 'front window' as you sleep in the king-sized loft bed. The host does a wonderful introduction to 'Flying Cloud' which includes the on site iPad with links to the popular attractions of the area. To the science buffs out there, prepare to be delighted. Are you a sailor perhaps? The host will regale you with tales. Two days is barely enough time to experience the area.
I could not recommend this place more highly. A marvelous piece of tropical high-altitude 'wet coast' Hawaiian paradise awaits the visitor to 'Ao Lele Flying Cloud'. Pictures do not do it justice and pictures though worth a 1000 words barely suffice.

Unreal value. This is a gem for sure, and I can't possibly imagine a cleaner or more well thought out hale. Mike knows what he's doing and his incredible property proves it. You'll be impressed, its peaceful, cozy and unique in its high end modern rustic sanctuary. It's also an excellent resource for the area history, ecology and all the amazing things to do in Hawaii Volcanoes National Park.

The cabin was clean and well appointed. Mike anticipates your every need. I enjoyed every minute sitting on the deck listening to Hawaiian birdsongs and viewing the ferns, trees, and other plant life. You feel like you are all alone in the jungle, yet volcanos national park is only 6 min away.  This is the perfect place to get away from it all.

This beautiful home was an amazing place to spend four days of our honeymoon. It is so close to Volcano National Park but still feels very secluded, like you are in the middle of the rainforest (which you are!). It is even more beautiful than the pictures and I cannot recommend it highly enough. 

Mike is the definition of above and beyond. From waiting in the driveway with an umbrella to carry our bags and protect us from the rain upon our arrival to dropping off freshly baked pumpkin bread one morning, he thinks of everything and is a very kind and considerate person. This was by far the most thorough check-in I've ever had on AirBnB, as he walked us through every detail of the cottage that we would need to know, including the many different approaches to coffee-making that were available! I'm sure he would have been happy to help if we had any questions, but he was so thorough in explanations of not only the cottage but also the national park and the Volcano community that we never had any. He obviously loves this cottage very much and you will too. 

My only tip is that it does get cool in the mornings and evenings. Mike warned us about this and provided firewood, a space heater and fluffy robes so it's not a problem, but my tip is to make bring some warm lounge-wear to make the mornings and evenings even cosier, which not everybody would think about planning a trip to Hawaii.
Lovely place. Very convenient to volcano and Mike spent a lot of time with us making sure we were informed and lots of nice touches around with flowers water pitchers and breakfast in fridge.

Perfect spot to experience living in the tropical fern forest vs. driving through it. Wrap around deck puts you in the forest with the birds.  Secluded location provides privacy. Home is beautifully constructed and Mike has thought of every detail for your comfort, from fresh flowers  to the softest quilts, and yummies in the kitchen. Volcano watching is an easy evening drive and special experience.

Great place that lived up to the hype of the other reviews! Very cozy and clean, and fantastic location close to the Volcanoes National Park. Having breakfast/coffee right in the cabin was very convenient. Mike was great at communicating and made himself available for any questions or concerns we may have.

One of the best Airbnb experiences I've had.  Rarely does the place you lay your head match up with the awesomeness of your surroundings when you're on vacation, but this was one of those times.  Mike is a consummate host - flexible, friendly, and thorough.  I extended my stay on the Hilo side of the island because of how much I loved his place.  Will definitely be back.

Do not believe the rave reviews about Mike's cabin in the rain forest.  It is much better than the best reviews.  The only downside is that his cabin and his quality as a host will spoil you for other rentals.
Beautiful cabin! Very close and convenient to the Volcano National Park!

The antique, footed tub in this home is sharply sloped and was recently re-glazed.  My husband fell almost immediately upon entering it --the tub is simply unsafe.  As a result, we did not stay and found accommodations elsewhere.  The home appeared clean but the host was clearly obsessed and spent a full hour telling us the do's & don'ts, while our dinners got cold and we were shivering on the porch... Ex: don't cook steak (no ventilation), don't leave the bathroom door open (humidity issue), don't wear shoes in the house, don't bring your suitcases upstairs to the bedroom, don't be concerned that the bedroom has no curtains, don't use the lights or the space heater too much because electricity is expensive in Hawaii, don't be alarmed to see the host working in the yard during our stay, and don't be alarmed if the host comes into the house while we're gone to get his yard tools, and on and on for an hour.  The whole experience was bizarre and uncomfortable.  The host wouldn't leave until we told him we had heard enough, that it was very late, that our dinners were now cold and so were we, and our groceries were sitting on the counter unpacked.  About an hour after the host finally left, my husband attempted to bathe and fell in the tub.  He could barely get out of the tub without falling again.  In all our stays in private homes and hotels, we have never previously experienced a tub so slippery.  While we were willing to overlook the host's bizarre behavior and rules, the unsafe tub was unacceptable.
Fantastic cabin in the rainforest - we loved our stay here. Mike was a truly great host.

A truly fantastic cabin in a delightful setting. Amazing attention to detail within the property and the grounds surrounding it. 
This was the perfect base to have for our stay on the Big Island.

What a wonderful experience! The location was great, minutes from the Volcano. The accomodation itself far exceeded our expectations - quaint in beautiful surroundings.

Mike was very informative, and helped us plan some activities while we were there. He was thorough without being over the top, as otherwise suggested by another reviewer here.

Ao Lele itself was one of the highlights of our entire trip. Thanks for a great stay.

Everything was perfect, from the more basic things (very clean, well equipped, great forest view, cosy) to the many details (fresh fruit, sharp knives, good coffe and tea, fresh water, many other complementary items like milk, eggs, juice, beer, nuts...). Mike takes very good care of the cabin and his guests and provided us with a lot of useful information. We can not confirm the bad comment posted by another couple.

Mike was without a doubt the best airbnb host we could ever ask for.  When we arrived at his house a little early, he was nothing but welcoming and informative.  He went around and showed us his stunning home, a little piece of paradise, and fully equipped with anything you could need.  He supplied us with a wonderful breakfast spread (inc but not limited to coffee, eggs, papaya, cereal, oatmeal, yogurt- and all different varieties to choose from!)  He was nothing but helpful, occasionally checking in on us to see if we needed anything via the airbnb app.  We would often come back from the day to find he restocked all the food and even cleaned the sheets/towels mid-way through our stay (we stayed an entire week.)  He was helpful but also respected our privacy - we never saw him our entire stay.
