Cath has thought of everything - including providing "Opal" cards for public transport - so generous! We will definitely be back if we have the opportunity to visit Sydney again. Highly recommended! Thanks again Cath!

We've had an excellent time at The garden studio. The shower was luxurious and just one of the many features that made this little oasis memorable. Cath was an excellent host, attentive while valuing the privacy of the guest. We loved the dogs! Thank you Cath for a lovely stay.

Cath couldn't have been more accommodating: we had a last minute flight cancellation (Jetstar. Grrr) and therefore a change of arrival time, however Cath was happy to receive us earlier than planned. The house is so peaceful. We had a lovely sleep in the delightful loft bed. And the shower was a real treat.
Marrickville has so many interesting nooks and crannies: we explored in all directions past the stunning old homes in Dulwich Hill, the array of Vietnamese restaurants in Marrickville and all the hip places heading up towards Enmore and Newtown. 
We couldn't have been more pleased with our choice of accommodation.

Cath made us very welcome. Although away for the weekend herself she keep regular contact to make sure we had everything we needed. 
A lovely array of breakfast goodies and snacks including fresh eggs, homemade strawberry jam, some delicious homemade biscuits, cereals, milk, fresh loaf of bread and some choccies n the fridge! 
Loved the shower! The garden was really lovely too. 
Thanks for a great stay Cath!
Great spot.  Fantastic quiet place.

The Garden Studio is lovely and Cath friendly and very helpful. We really enjoyed our stay with a yummy breakfast of cereal or fresh eggs (from the three beautiful chickens) and plenty of things to do. The apartment is perfect, short walk to the train or bus, and close to shops and restaurants. Highly recommended! Thanks Cath for a great stay!

The listing of the accommodation was accurate everything was provided, the location was very close to the city and the airport making it very easy to travel to. Cath provided us with an amazing breakfast hamper which was so thoughtful and very convenient to us. The place was very cozy and modern, had a great experience, thanks Cath!

Cath is one of those lovely people that make everything lovely. She's clearly got an eye for design because this place has been so cleverly done. 
She left me beautiful homemade jam, fresh eggs from her gorgeous chickens, a chocolate eater egg, milk, a very generous selection of cereals ... she really knows how to make you feel welcome. 
The cottage is very comfortable and it's completely private, fully equipped, comfortable bed, close to transport. There is nothing at all to fault. I really appreciate it so thanks Cath for a fantastic stay!

A fantastic place to stay away from the hustle and bustle of Sydney but still close to all of the action. Soaking up the morning sun with a cup of tea, a croissant and a good book - pure bliss. Cath sure knows how to make you feel at home, with fresh bread and a well-stocked kitchen. Oh, and a very comfortable bed! Pop down the road to Cornersmith Cafe for a delicious breakfast or read a book under the big trees in the park at the end of the street. I wish I could have stayed longer - I definitely plan to come back!

I've stayed with Cath before and I would stay again. 
Cath is a professional at this business without the boring-ness of a hotel. She's lovely, her studio is lovely and the location is great.

We loved our stay at The Garden Studio. It had everything we needed for a comfortable weekend, including fresh eggs from the resident chooks! We'd highly recommend it for an easy, chilled out stay in Sydney's inner west.

Do yourself a favour and stay here! Cath is an awesome, thoughtful and friendly host. You'll find incredible attention to detail and generosity at every turn in The Garden Studio. Thanks so much for everything, Cath.

The garden studio was so lovely- it was perfect for our Sydney weekend away. Cath was a welcoming and lovely host. The studio was warm and cozy and there was coffee, breakfast, delicious bread, home made cookies- we 100% recommend this. Thank you so much Cath.

We were so happy with Cath's Garden Studio. Everything was clean and looked just like the photos. We felt very comfortable, safe, and right at home. Cath was so sweet to bring us fresh eggs, fresh bread and warm croissants in the morning. She was very kind and helpful whenever we had questions. The fresh towels smelled so good and the bed was super comfortable (we didn't want to get out of bed!) This space is perfect for one or two people. Thank you, Cath!!! :)

Cath's little garden studio we could have hoped for and more! Cath and her pup welcomed us warmly upon our arrival, and the little studio was a warm home away from home. Every little detail had been thought of, and the bountiful breakfast basket was a delight, as was the little delivery from the bread fairy the following morning, and the fresh eggs from the little chickies in the garden :) The location was great - a very comfortable walking distance to Newtown and Marrickville which meant we were able to enjoy the great food, coffee and beer that the locality has to offer, as well as great theatre at the Depot. Cath's recommendations for local must-dos were much appreciated. The street is lovely and quiet, with a park at the end. Getting to and from the train was also a breeze. This is a rare gem, one which we will definitely be returning to!

We had a lovely stay in the garden studio. Cath was friendly and gave us some great tips for places to visit in the area. The studio is well designed and had everything we needed. We would definitely stay again.

Cath was very warm and welcoming, as were her 3 chickens! The accomodation had everything we could possibly need, even opal cards to use. Fresh bread was waiting at the door on Sunday morning which went down a treat. The studio was snug and warm and I'd like to build one myself, it was very cool! 
5 stars :)

We had a lovely stay here! Cath was super helpful when we arrived, and graciously gave us privacy thereafter. The kitchen was well stocked and the accommodations adorable and comfy - we especially loved the shower, which was like standing in tropical rain! Very much recommended. :)

Excellent self contained studio with everything you need for a comfortable stay with thought put into the little things like bathroom, kitchen and food supplies along with additional bits and bobs like travel cards, umbrellas, power adapters and more! Very lovely host who obviously takes pride in presenting accommodation like their own home.

Cath was incredibly accommodating and her place is perfect for a getaway for two! Cath's little flat is modern and clean and sleek with a fun loft bed that helped you feel hidden away from the world. The area is great if you want to be a little ways from the busyness of the city but not too far to travel either. Cath provided us with fresh bread and croissants for breakfast which was just the cherry on top of a wonderful stay. Cath is a friendly host who will assist you with anything you need. If you're looking for a calm stay outside the city then this is the place for you! Would definitely stay their again. Thanks Cath!

Cath was a great communicator and responded quickly to any questions. The studio was charming and a short walk to cafes and train stations etc. The breakfast muesli and freshly baked biscuits were delicious!
Beautiful little place with great amenities and Cath was a wonderful host.

We had a wonderful time in the Garden Studio.  It had everything we wished for, good bed, wonderful shower, and more!  A tasteful breakfasthamper i.e. Cath is a great host, who reacts very quickly and let us drop of our bags on her veranda very early in the morning.  We would recommend this address to everyone!

Very nice little studio apartment. Looks exactly like the pictures. We only saw Cath very briefly but she made the whole process very easy. Good selections of breakfast items and a great bathroom, lounge room is small but functional. This studio may not suit you if you're a light sleeper it has a lot of natural morning light and planes flying close by. Location is smack in the middle of 3 train lines all about 15mins walk away.
Not super close to the city center, but good if you have a car to park and don't want to pay.
Thanks for a good stay!
Cath was fantastic and the accommodation was exactly as described. Great location in a quiet street. Breaky pack was great and fresh eggs from the chickens. Thanks Cath

Cath is a fantastic host and her studio space is perfect if you want to stay in the real Sydney! Marrickville is within walking distance to quick bus rides into Newtown and the city. Cath has obviously travelled herself, as she is aware of all the little conveniences to include within her space to make it a really super great stay. Would definitely recommend!!!

Cath is een vriendelijke dame maar was niet gecharmeerd over onze opmerkingen over ladder en betonvloer. De buurt ligt direct onder de uitvliegroute van de luchthaven. Veel lawaai van zeer laag over komende vliegtuigen van 06.30 tot 23.00. Bed boven kan alleen kruipend bereikt worden omdat er geen stahoogte is.

Cath was a fabulous host, we arrived late at night and she was very accomodating. The studio was cozy and has everything you need for a short stay. Cath generously provided fresh bread and breakfast in the morning which was very generous and a nice touch. We had a wonderful stay and would highly recommend the Garden studio!
Le Garden Studio est adorable et au calme. L'endroit parfait pour se reposer après un (très) long vol! Notre hôte a été pleine d'attention pour un excellent séjour. Merci Cath!
Cath has really thought of everything to make your stay comfortable.  The amenities in the apartment are above and beyond anything I expected.  We had a lovely stay and would certainly return.

We had a wonderful two night stay in the Garden Suite during our visit to Sydney. Cath was an awesome host! We really loved the functionality and style of the space. It's like a perfect tiny home with everything you need! Cath left an incredible breakfast basket that made our mornings easy and really made it feel like home. She includes a comprehensive guidebook in the unit and transit cards that helped us to get around. Nothing but positive things to say about our visit! We would highly recommend staying here!
Everything is exactly same as the description and pictures. The garden studio is a small cozy space in lovely neighborhood.

Cath is a super host and fellow frequent traveler and this is very evident in the garden studio.  There are tons of personal touches and amenities that make you feel like you are staying at a very close friend's place.  If you forgot anything at home, she probably has it neatly tucked away in a corner of the studio.  We had a wonderful stay.

This place was cosy and comfortable ; my husband and I stayed three nights for our friend's wedding. It has everything we need. Breakfast was great as well ; bread, muesli, eggs are all good. 
We also walked to marrickville station which has so many Vietnamese restaurants and many of them are so good! 
Cath is also nice. She made our stay so comfortable .. 
We would come back when we go back to Sydney. We would definitely recommend this place!

Had a wonderful stay, Cath was the perfect host, a well thought out space with everything you need. 
Catch let us do laundry and was very attentive and friendly .

Thank you :)
A beautifully and cleverly designed studio, in a great location. Quiet place, fabulous bathroom and wonderful breakfast hamper. Cath's hospitality was wonderful. Highly recommend.

Cath's place was a great location for our short stay in Sydney, nice quiet street, close drive or taxi ride to the city and walking distance to shops and public transport and plenty of on street (free) parking. 

Cath was a great host welcoming us with a clean place, plenty of refreshments and snacks/breakfast upon arrival. Her place had everything we needed to make our stay more comfortable.

Highly recommend!

The Garden Studio is a lovely, comfortable, and beautiful place to stay at, and we would be more than happy to come and stay here again. Cath was very lovely, accommodating, and understanding. We highly recommend her place to everyone. The place was very clean and there were milk, eggs, and a breakfast hamper when we arrived, plus fresh bread in the morning which was a lovely thing to wake up to. The kitchen and bathroom were kitted out with everything that a traveller ever needs plus more. We also loved that it was near a few train stations and bus stops, and it's just a pleasant walk to lively Newtown. Thanks again Cath for having us and for being so understanding! We couldn't rate your place highly enough, if we could give it 10 out of 5 stars we would! :)

The garden studio is a gem and we loved our time there.  Cosy, but well equipped, Cath's extra little touches make this our top favourite air bnb location.  The breakfast hamper that is provided is a very thoughtful touch; cereal, muesli, baked beans, porridge oats, eggs, juice., freshly baked bread from the local bakery...Cath was also very accommodating with our dietary requirements-vegan- and provided us with almond milk, coconut yoghurt, dairy free margarine and coconut & chia puddings. 

Free parking outside was also a bonus and we never had any issues with finding a space.

Highly recommend staying here!

We had a perfect time in Cath´s Garden Studio. The Studio is just as it is described. It is very clean, nicely arranged and decorated. We felt that Cath wants her guests feel really comfortable and happy in it. The breakfast basket with bread, eggs, milk and muesli made it complete. The Studio is not very big but it has everything which is needed. Very nice and lovely! a little treasury :)

Cath is very attentive, helpful and extremely pleasant. She was always reachable when we asked for insider tips or had questions concerning locations to visit. The "cherry on top of the cake" was that Cath brought us to the airport on our last day! Thanks again!

So for us it is not difficult to summarize that Cath (and her husband mark) are excellent "super hosts"! We loved the week in Marrickville and enjoyed the stay in the Garden Studio. Highly recommended!!! :)

Cath and Mark: Thank you very very much for being your guests! It was a great time in Sydney and your lovely Garden Studio. It was a pleasure meeting you!

And: the next time you are in germany near to us... you already know... :)
Cath's place is perfect for a little Sydney getaway. The thought to detail is outstanding, and Cath is a lovely and welcoming host. The garden shed has everything you need and more. You have to stay!

This Garden studio is  a home sweet home away from your home:) I know you just don't get it from what I have just said.
Okay here it is and I am gonna make it short .
The studio has got all the essentials you need which  is being mentioned in the house manual.
We just loved staying at the garden studio for almost two weeks .
I highly recommend this place for a peaceful and enjoyable stay.

My friend and I had a wonderful time at Cath's. The place was beautiful and Cath was lovely. She has equipped the studio with everything you could possibly need and more. I would highly recommend staying here to anyone.

We absolutely loved our stay at the garden studio - the only bad thing was having to leave! It's the perfect base for solo travellers or couples to explore Sydney and is definitely the best equipped Air BnB we've stayed in to date. The breakfast basket was fab, as were the delicious cookies we found on our doorstep when we arrived home  on our last night. Cath was super helpful and friendly (as was Hazelnut the adorable pup!). Highly recommend and would definitely stay again.
Really nice, comfortable and clean studio, with all supplies (like fridge, coffeemachine, tea, eggcooker etc) inclusive!

Kath was lovely  to ensure that all were well, good and safe for me. This place is gd and safe for female solo traveller. 

The lovely studio is very clean  and aesthetically pleasing.

Perfect is the only appropriate word to describe this place! The design of Cath's little studio/loft is exceptional, we genuinely did not want to leave. Great central location in a beautiful leafy suburb, plenty of parking and an incredible host. Cath was so kind and helpful and her Labrador Hazelnut was just adorable. This is perfect place to base yourself to enjoy the best of Sydney - we will be back! 10/10!
Cath's studio is really lovely.  A cozy set-up with everything you need plus some very kind considerations from Cath in the hamper.  I would certainly stay there again.
Great place, great price, lovely people.

Amazing place, cosy and cute studio, almost felt me and my Wife stayed in a luxury treehouse with the bed on second level. Cath made some. Amazing hot cross buns, convenient little veggie patch and adorable dog to welcome us home, from our various Sydney outings, located conveniently to travel throughout Sydney!
PERFECT!

Cath appartment is a wonderful place to stay when visiting Sydney.  The garden appartment is in a quite neighborhood but offers everything in close vincinity (shops, grocery stores, restaurants) and with the 2 Opal cards Cath provides you are perfectly equipped to use busses and trains to explore Sydney. 
I really enjoyed my stay and was treated like a king.

Fantastic 'Tiny house', these guys have thought of everything to make the stay comfy and easy. Easy to find, easy to stay, warm and clean. Delicious, free range, home laid eggs for breakfast. I climbed the ladder easier than I thought I would :-) Thank you very much Cath :-)

Thanks Cath we really enjoyed our stay at your place. Nice chookies and dog Hazel. Lovely to eat eggs from your chooks and pick greens and tomatoes from your garden!
Right balance of privacy and contact - thanks we'll be back.

Wonderful little home. 
We stayed at Cath's studio for one month and had an incredible time, the place is quiet and private, yet walking distance to delicious restaurants and pretty parks. 
The studio is clean, fully equipped, very modern and beautifully decorated, it even has a veggie garden. 
Most importantly however, was that Cath was the perfect host. 
We'll be back :)

This is THE garden oasis if you want to stay anywhere near marrickville. Really comfy bed delightful space easy parking plus breakfast. You do need to climb the ladder to bed (and down in the morning) but the space and facilities are superb. A real treasure.

Easily the best Airbnb I've stayed in. Booked based on previous reviews and we can only agree. 
Plenty of wonderful touches, homemade produce, fridge and cupboards stacked with all the things you could need. 
Comfy bed and lovely rainfall shower. Clean and tidy. No faults at all. 
Thank you for a lovely stay Cath!
Fantastic little unit with awesome breakfast provided, very neat and clean. Would certainly recommend!

The place was as small as shown in the pictures, and still equipped with  everything one may need, including everything for cooking in the tiny kitchen. Cath was attentive and generous in house supplies.

Cath is a great host and easy to deal with. She was thoughtful and even asked what type of milk I preferred. The space is just as described. I was only there for a quick work trip so it was the perfect size for me. It was a quick 15 min walk to the train station too. I would definitely stay there again.
Place was great - perfectly located. Would recommend and I will definitely book again

房间很漂亮 
麻雀虽小五脏俱全 能想到的东西房间都能找到 门口有个小院子 坐在那里喝喝茶看看天空再舒服不过
房东还很贴心的准备了很多种谷物和面包当早餐
房子离tram站有一些远 拖着行李还是挺累的 附近的公交又不太准点
不过去哪都还算方便
到的前一天房东还很贴心地问了我们想要哪种牛奶 
飞机晚点很晚才到还在院子里等着我们
房东有只很可爱的大狗狗 不过要白天才能遇到哦

A lovely place with a really cute loft bedroom, a comfortable downstairs area and Cath left us various goodies to make our breakfast. Cath has lovely garden spaces with chickens, and an area to sit and soak in the sun. Easy street parking and walking distance to cafes and shops. Throughly enjoyed our stay and would recommend to anyone able to manage the ladder. Would happily stay again.
Lovely garden house with a little bit of a farm-like feeling to it. Cath was quick to respond and even though we had to leave earlier than planned, was very easy to get along with.

I stayed at Cath's place for around 10 days and found it exactly as described. A cute space with a comfy bed, clean bathroom and handy kitchen. It included Cath's thoughful touches such as the breakfast hamper which was very nice. I would not hesitate recommending Cath's place.

Cath was the perfect host! She provided everything we needed from universal adapters to fresh eggs from her chickens. Cath even provides a binder full of information about the area (nearby hospitals, cute coffee places, things to do). The Garden Studio itself is very cute and stylish. My boyfriend and I stayed here for several weeks, and it had everything we needed. We couldn’t have asked for a better host or a better space for our stay in Sydney.
Nice little bungalow out the back, sleeping area felt quite small. Overall good but very small.

Cath’s Studio was all we needed for a 4 night stay in Sydney. Close to Sydney Uni for the daily commute for lectures
Thank you Cath

We had a great stay in Cathy’s studio - had everything we needed, nicely furnished & a cosy space.
Would recommend & stay again 
Cath was great to deal with
Great place, smallish, but well organised, quiet, close to transport. Quick and helpful communication with Cath. Definitely recommend.

Great location. Beautiful garden. Easy check in. Lovely neighbourhood. 
Comfy bed. Nice touches like breakfast.
Owner is very nice,place not big,but very clean and comfortable

We really enjoyed staying in this lovely little tiny home! It was plenty big enough. We had everything we needed, heaps of privacy and good supplies! Was definitely more than I expected. We loved staying in Marrickville and Cath’s book of tips were really helpful. It was good being in walking distance to public transport and there was plenty of parking on the street. Really enjoyed our stay and would definitely come back again!
Cath’s Garden Studio was the perfect place for me to stay while visiting my friends who live in the area! Would definitely stay again. Breakfast provided was a very nice touch too!
Highly recommend lovely host who makes you feel at home and very welcome on her amazing studio!

name: Rented Room
summary: Beautiful room and with a great location in the city of Rio de Janeiro
description: Beautiful room and with a great location in the city of Rio de Janeiro

name: Cheerful new renovated central apt
summary: The full equipped apartment located in the heritage district of Istanbul, colorful Tarlabaşı. If you are looking for a place where you really want to taste the chaos with harmony like a real Istanbuller you are very welcome to stay in my apartment.
space: Hi there!  My name is Aybike. I love to travel, to discover new places and to meet new people. I will be glad to hosting you in Istanbul at my place. My apartment is newly renovated, clean, cosy, comfortable, large enough for 8 people and is situated literally at the heart of Istanbul. Apartment has one of the unique examples of turn-of-the-century Levantine architecture in Turkey: slim, four-storey bow-fronted homes that huddle along winding, narrow streets.  Located in a street as it was used to be; the ground floors often served as stores or workshops.  More likes to come to your posts in Instagram ! As a traveller my wish is to make you feel at home; drink your morning coffee while listening to the sound of Istanbul then take your map, jump into the street with friendly neighborhood,  and enjoy the city without running, walking, exploring, watching, reading and hearing. I know how it is important to be able to feel the city you are visiting. So if you are looking for a place where
description: The full equipped apartment located in the heritage district of Istanbul, colorful Tarlabaşı. If you are looking for a place where you really want to taste the chaos with harmony like a real Istanbuller you are very welcome to stay in my apartment. Hi there!  My name is Aybike. I love to travel, to discover new places and to meet new people. I will be glad to hosting you in Istanbul at my place. My apartment is newly renovated, clean, cosy, comfortable, large enough for 8 people and is situated literally at the heart of Istanbul. Apartment has one of the unique examples of turn-of-the-century Levantine architecture in Turkey: slim, four-storey bow-fronted homes that huddle along winding, narrow streets.  Located in a street as it was used to be; the ground floors often served as stores or workshops.  More likes to come to your posts in Instagram ! As a traveller my wish is to make you feel at home; drink your morning coffee while listening to the sound of Istanbul then take your map, j
neighborhood_overview: Great location will allow you to explore and enjoy Taksim, Pera,Galata , Şişhane and Cihangir. (great walking distance for all the events), Easily accessible to subway, tram, ferries. The neighbourhood is friendly and diverse. It is only 3 minutes by walk to the Galatasaray Square which is located approximately at the center of the Istiklal Avenue. Istiklal Avenue is located in the historic Beyoğlu (Pera) district, it is an elegant pedestrian street, 1.4 kilometers long, which houses boutiques, music stores, bookstores, art galleries, cinemas, theatres, libraries, cafés, pubs, night clubs with live music, historical patisseries, chocolateries and restaurants.  You should definately walk through the local bazaar on Sunday right beside the apartment. You can find anything you need with cheap prices; fruits, vegetables, nuts, fish, meat, dairy products! Local bazaars will be very helpful to understand the culture of Turkish people as well. There are couple of restaurants close by where yo
notes: From/To Airports: There are several ways to get from the airport to the apartment, but the most convenient manner is to take “HAVATAŞ" shuttle to Taksim Square departing every 30 minutes from the airport (from both airports- Atatürk and Sabiha Gökçen). As you may be unfamiliar with the area, I am happy to come and pick you up in front of Galatasaray Highschool (on Istiklal Street) which is 10 minutes walk from Taksim Square where you will get off. I can always advise you cheaper public transport options if you ask for. Useful information: You can rent the apartment/room for (a) day(s), week, month or longer periods of time.  There is various supermarkets conveniently situated a block away from the apartment on the way to Istiklal street, also a small kiosk right next to the apartment and a laundry in 100 meters distance.
transit: Getting around by Walk, Subway, Bus, Tram, Ferry, Tunnel: You can take one of the world's oldest tram on Istiklal street by 3 minutes walk from the apartment on Istiklal street. By tram you can end up in Istanbul’s Tunnel (Tünel) which is the world’s shortest and third-oldest passenger terminal. This one-stop funicular climbs the steeply uphill for 500 meters from Karaköy to Tünel and the other way around. Karaköy is today a major transport hub for intercity and also a house of unique cafes and galleries. We can count Karaköy for the city's recent hip?? district. The Galata Bridge connects Karaköy with the Old City, on which the fast tram line Zeytinburnu-Kabataş runs with. This tram line goes to Atatürk Airport within 1 hour. Ferry boats run every 10 to 20 minutes from the ferry terminal on a pontoon to Haydarpaşa train terminal and Kadıköy across the Asian shore of Bosphorus. You should definately walk throgh Kadıköy at day/night time. Many different tastes of joy. It is also only tw
access: First of all you will have access to everything in the apartment. The apartment is on the first floor. There are three  bedrooms; two has double bed and one has a sofa bed for two people. In the living room there is a TV, a wooden dining table with four chairs and a corner sofa bed (for two people). In the kitchen there are dishes, glasses, pans, cutlery, fridge, kettle, microwave, coffee machine and a teapot. Coffee and tea will be avaliable for you. There is a bathroom with shower, towels, shampoo, soap, toilet paper, hair dryer and of course hot water:) Iron and ironing board, a washing machine and an air-conditioner avaliable. There is a balcony where you can smoke (please not in the apartment). Wifi and clean bed linen will be ready for you.
interaction: I will always respect your privacy. If you book the entire apartment I will bring you the keys on the day of your arrival and will take them from you on the day you leave or you can leave them at home on the table:)  However, if it is possible for both of us, we can always have a walk or drink coffee/tea/beer. For any sort of problem like technical or just a trip advise you can always call and ask for help.
house_rules: • Please lock the doors and close the windows when you leave the flat. • Please don´t change the heat controller settings. • Please be respectful to the neighbors regarding noise levels. • If you are a smoker please smoke by the window  or at the balcony Welcome to your home!

host.host_about: My name is Aybike. I love to travel, to discover new places and to meet new people. I will be glad to hosting you in Istanbul at my place. My apartment is newly renovated, clean, cosy, comfortable, large enough for 8 people and is situated literally at the heart of Istanbul. As a traveller my wish is to make you feel at home; drink your morning coffee while listening to the sound of Istanbul then take your map, jump into the street with friendly neighbourhood,  and enjoy the city with walking, exploring, watching, reading and hearing. I know how it is important to be able to feel the city you are visiting from my experiences. So if you are looking for a place where you really want to taste the chaos with harmony like a real Istanbuller you are very welcome to stay in my apartment.

reviews.comments:
We rented Aybike's apartment as a group of four. We were met by Aybike on arrival, she is a great host, very welcoming, responsive and attentive. We even got some sweets prepared by her mother, which was extremely sweet. Even though we only were the first guests for her, I am sure Aybike will be a great host. 
The apartment itself is cozy and bright. Although more people could potentially stay there we felt that it was perfect for four. It is fully equipped with everything necessary. We couldn't think of anything we would need that was missing. The location is great close to Istiklal street and a walking distance to many major attrcations. 
We can warmly recommend Aybike and her apartment!
Best regards,
Oksana, Victor, Liuda, Stas

The apartment was the cutest thing and so comfortable, Aybike was extremely prepared with everything and she's really nice, the apartment had everything we needed. Good location, it has a very friendly restaurant right in front of it, that is open 24/7. We had such a great experience!
Het appartement ligt in een goede buurt, dicht bij alles. Aybike is zeer gastvrij en leuk. Appartement zelf had ook alles.

We had an great time staying in Aybike's flat, it was the perfect flat in the perfect location for us. There was three of us staying in this flat and it was just right for us. The flat was clean and tidy, it had everything we need, plenty towels and bedding available for us. The flat is situated in the perfect location for you to get the real sense of Istanbul with its locals and the culture. It's so central, 2 mins walk away from Istikal Street, 10 mins walk away Galata and Cihangir and 10 mins on the public transport to Old City. 
Aybike was great she was very attentive to all our needs and very friendly and warm, any problem she was there. We had a lot of fun this flat it was great!!

We had a really wonderful time at Aybike's apartment- it was very well equipped with everything we needed (and more!) and was a great base from which to explore the city. It's in a busy and fun area but still quiet enough at night for good sleep. Aybike was a brilliant host- very accommodating and warm. We'd come back in a heartbeat!

Aybike made us feel very welcome, she was very nice and as our flight was changed to a later flight she waited in the apartement for us, thanks again! The apartement is equiped with everything you need, the bars outside and the hole area was always with a lot of people, we never felt unsafe at night walking in the streets.  we can recommend it!

Aybike was the nicest host you can imagine. She provided us with maps from Istambul and recommended some sightseeing points. She let us use her metro card during our stay. Her flat is clean, tidy and within a walkable distance from Taksim Square, where you can move to any part of the city. I definitely recommend her for your stay in Istambul.

We rented Aybike's appartment for 6 adults and 3 children! we easily fitted to this cosy flat. It had enough sleeping places for all of us. The flat is realy well equipted with everything needed for travelers and even some food left for the first snack. The location is good, near Istiklal street. Aybike was quick responcive. We had problems with hot water but it was solved quickly. Her mother was very polite and met us with  homemade sweet cookies. Every person were provided with set of towels for face and body. They were new, soft and clean. The streets are very nosy but when tired it doesn't metter :). I would like to come again and highly recommend it. Good luck and thank you Aybike!

Aybike's apartment truly is at the heart of Istanbul. We were able to walk to Taksim Street in minutes and use that find transport anywhere else. Shops and a 24-hour local eatery were seconds away. Her apartment was clean, cosy, and packed with everything one would need - all kinds of household items, maps and tourist guides, Internet, snacks, etc. We were five adults, including 2 elderly. Aybike catered to all of us wonderfully, even dropping off a fan when we mentioned that the elders were feeling a bit hot. Throughout our stay she was always responsive on (Hidden by Airbnb) and regularly gave advice regarding our Istanbul adventures. Even after we left, she informed us of an item we had left behind, and offered to help send it to us. Please visit us in Dhaka, Aybike!

We love that Place, just 3 min. walk to Istiklal street, 1 min. to Bus stataion and 5 to 10 min. to Shishane subway station, so I really cant think of a better location.
Aybike is a very professional Host and helped us all the way at everything we needed, starting from basic orientation to arranging Transfer to Airport, we loved the Apt. and really felt Home and will always stay there when we visit Istanbul Again.
Thank you Aybike

My boyfriend, dad, and I had a great time at this apartment! It is close to all the major tourist locations and close to shops, cafes, and galleries. Really a great location. The apartment is beautiful and the bed and pillows are super comfortable. Also the high speed internet works great and the AC was a nice bonus! I would definitely stay here again!

Amazing location, love the Apt# 
this is my 2nd stay and will always stay there.
Aybike and Fatima ( her mother ) are very kind and friendly Hosts.

This is our second stay at Aybike's apartment! We liked it so much at the beginning of our road trip all over turkey so we stayed here when we came back! 
My dad, boyfriend, and I were very comfortable here. It is close by to the main shopping and movie theater in Taxim, and close to all transportation, plus easy access to the airport via shuttle or taxi. 
Aybike has great communication skills and was always available for our arrival and advice. Highly recommend!

Aybike was very kind and attentive with communications, suggesting some nice things to do in Istabul. The apartment was in a great location, walkable to everything we wanted to do. The front room was light and airy, with an eclectic design. Both the bedrooms however have little natural light, so if this is important to you it might not be your best choice. There were some plumbing issues which were frustrating.  Aybike was quick to respond to concerns, though nothing could be done right away. Hopefully issues will be resolved quickly for the next guest.

We'd like to thanks Aybike for everything she did for us, it was nice trip to Istanbul, we have faced some problems, but we solved as well.
A suitable place for a certain number of people (between 1 to 4 persons), and all supplies are available in place.
the house was comfortable and close to Taksim square about ten minutes walking, and the house was very well equipped, the hosts welcomed us really nicely.

오자마자 식탁에 있는 쿠키와 과자들, 그리고 반갑게 맞아주는 주인분 어머니와 주인분.
그분들의 친절때문에 잘지낼 수 있었습니다.
거리,청결,와이파이,화장실,침실 등 하나하나 모든게 다 좋았습니다.
강추합니다.
여기서 지내시면 더 재미있게 이스탄불 여행을 하실 수 있으실 것입니다:)

I cannot speak negatively at all. Beautiful apartment, well located, great hospitality. 

We were recieved by Aybike's mom, Fatima, which is a great person. Explained everything thing, showed us where everything is and offered us some nice pastries. Aybike, although she was not physically available, she was always reachable via phone and Airbnb communication. 

the apartment is a few minutes away from Istiklal st. and nearby many restaurants and grocery stores.

I recommend staying here.
I loved the apartment. Very cozy & clean. Temperature was very good. Beds are comfy and sheets are clean. Bathroom was awsum, loved taking showers. Perfect stay.

Me and my friend love aybike apartment soo much! we were traveling during winter time and Istanbul quite cold soo after all day long walking in the cold arriving in aybike apartment feels like heaven. Warm and comfortable. 

Very nice and cute apartment, good location, very good wifi connection, very near to istiqlal street. we are 7 people and the apartment has enough space for us. 

Thank you soo much!

Aybike's apartment is very cozy and very good value for money!  It is located in a colorful area in a walking distance of the city center. Aybike herself was extremely kind and did everything she could in order to help us enjoy our staying in Istanbul.
Aybike's place was so beautiful close to the Taksim and metro station, definitely will be back )
Un appartement trés agreable . A proximite de la station de metro. Je le recommande vivement
Все очень понравилось, Aybike и ее родственники очень милые люди, встретили нас поздним вечером. Помогли организовать трансфер из аэропорта. Расположение апартаментов очень удобное, рекомендую.

Aybike's bolig ligger perfekt ud til en stor vej med masser af bus og taxier. Den ligger 2 min fra Istiklal Cd., og 10 min fra Taksim eller Galata Tower. Virkelig en god beliggenhed, der stærkt kan anbefales. Lejligheden var ren og godt møbleret. Aybike er rigtig nem at få kontakt til og var til rigtig stor hjælp. Vi fik transport fra lufthaven og blev kørt over til lejligheden. Rigtig godt wifi. 
Lejligheden ligger i et lidt ældre og lokalt område og derfor er det vigtigt at man er lidt påpasselig med sin mobil og penge, specielt om aften. Men det er en general ting overalt i Istanbul.

Aybike's place is exactly how she describes it here, very accurate. The neighbourhood might seem a bit rough at a first sight but it's actually pretty safe and people are nice. Also the apartment is very cosy and homey, you just want to stay in. It has a pretty good isolation, you don't really hear the noise from the busy street outside. It's centrally located, walking distance to A-listed places in the European side of Istanbul such as Taksim and Istiklal. Only one of us get to meet Aybike one day before check in to get the key, but she's very easy to communicate with and also very kind to lend us metro cards. Thanks! We enjoyed staying at your place. :)

Aybike'nin dairesi belirtildiği gibi merkeze çok yakın. Istiklal Caddesi'nin merkezine iki dakika yurume mesafesinde bulunuyor. Temiz ve rahat. Her seyden otesi Aybike her sorumuzda yanimizda oldu, bunun icin tekrar kendisine tesekkurler.

Aybike is a great host. She helped us to arrange an airport transfer for our large family of 8.  Her Mom was there to greet us and to make sure that we got settled in.  The flat is wonderful and it is in the perfect location.  Just a 2 minute walk to 2 grocers and 5 minutes to Istiklal Street.   We will certainly recommend Aybike's place to other friends traveling to Istanbul.

Aybike is a lovely host, who took care of us in answering any questions we had to arranging transport from and to the airport. She made the process simple and straightforward with good communication. The apartment was cosy and located at a good walking distance to Taksim square and the metro located there. It is a great location for anyone who wants to soak in a different angle of Istanbul in the Beyoglu historical area!

Il faut pas hésiter de réserver cet appartement il est super bien , exactement comme il est décrit, proche de taksim istiklal les transport en commun sont à côté, on a passé un agréable séjour en plus AYBIKE est très aimable.

We  ( family mother, brothers, sister and children )stayed in this flat for about 4 weeks, we rented the whole flat . It was very comfortable near the Center. The kitchen is small but we don't need to cook because everything is available nearby. The owner, Aybike is really nice and lovely, she gave us many advice .We recommend this flat and we hope to be back again next year.
Everything are great in this beautiful city, thank you Aybike.

Aybike was a wonderful host and very accommodating to us for our check in and check out. There were 7 of us staying so it was cosy, but the apartment was really nicely decorated, clean and tidy and had everything we needed for our weekend stay, so it was perfect for us!! Thanks Aybike

Aybike’s home was fantastic for our first visit to Istanbul. Being very close to amenities and Taksim square we had easy access to everywhere we wanted to go. We were a group of four and we slept very comfortably amd enjoyed being at home resting after our long walks in what is probably the best city we have ever been. Her house is cosy, very nicely decorated, with hot water at all times and very interesting books to read if you feel like relaxing on the coach ;). Aybike was very helpful and arranged for our transportation in and out of the airport and was always available for anything we needed! Would highly recommend her home for your stay in Istanbul!

Hello All, Aybike ist a very nice person. We met also her mom & dad. About the flat: The flat ist cute like on the pictures. Everything what we needed was in the flat. For e.g. towels, blankets, pillows and so on...  Only one negativ point is that the flat is dusty on some spots and very loud because of the busy road in front of the house.. Anyways, it is also a dangerous area. You shouldn't walk alone in the nighttime. All in one: For a big group it is nice to stay here, because u can see the big city from another point and not only as a tourist.

I stayed in Aybike‘s apartment for almost 3 weeks and it was awesome. The flat is in an old buildung with a great flair- I loved all the little details in her apartment. The bed was very cosy and everything very clean. 3 minutes away from the Istiklal Caddesi where you can find everything to eat and drink or other possibilities to shop. I could not meet Aybike personally but her amazing mom received and welcomed me. Next time I visit Istanbul we will definitely have dinner together with her mom.  Although I did not meet Aybike she was available the whole time to help. 
Thank you very very much, Aybike! Hope to see you next year!
Posizione e parecchie camere ... consiglio a tutti ! In 4 ragazzi c’è fin troppo spazio.

Aybike is a wonderful host - she gave us lots of tips on local places to go and helped us by booking a restaurant table for our birthday celebration. Her apartment is ideally located for Taksim Square, with plenty of local restaurants, and within walking distance (approx. 45 mins) of the old town. Good value for money and would definitely stay again.

We're Airbnb hosts ourselves and we've visited a lot of Airbnb properties over the years. Aybike's apartment was a great place. Aybike provided everything we needed. We were a party of 3 adults and 2 kids and had enough space to get comfortable. The apartment was clean, nicely decorated, and stocked with the necessities. The location perfect. You're right in the heart of a lively area and can walk to plenty of action (restaurants, attractions, bars, shopsetc) in 5-20 minutes. There is also a great 24 hour local restaurant directly across the street from the apartment. Aybike was quick to respond to any questions and provided very valuable recommendations. I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for an authentic Istanbul experience.

Comfortable beds in bedrooms, modern showers, and accessories, accessible location to all public transport and major tourist hubs. Very clean and reachable for help anytime needed. Strongly suggest to stay once and enjoy your own home. Special thanks to Aybike mom and dad for being so friendly and helping while departing towards the airport.
Muy bueno.
Υπεροχος χωρος και υπεροχη φιλοξενια. Τα παντα διπλα απο το σπιτι.

Nice and cheap apartment near Istiklal. Suitable for large companies or families. Aybike and her mother were very kind and helpful. They helped us with Taxi and treated us with sweets. In general, everything was excellent. The only trouble is the noise of cars under the window in the hall, which prevents sleep.
Great apartment, very close to Taksim square, with lots of markets and food places around. Aybike is a wonderful host, and her mom is the nicest lady I have ever met.
Aybike was an excellent host, very friendly, warm, welcoming, professional, kind and on time. Location is superb, cleanness was a little off and certainly photos were much better.

The location of the house is perfect, less than 5 min and you are in Istiklal street. 2 min and you can easily take buses or taxi.
The owner and her Mom are very sweet and are ready to help any time you contact them.
The house is well equiped with all basic things you need for daily use.
I highly recommend visitors to book this house.
The photos give an impression that the house is more spacious than the reality, but it can easilay accomodate 6 people.
Regards

Thanks for the great stay at your place Aybike.  Immediately we were made to feel welcome with fresh bread and cheese.

If you want to stay near Taksim this is a great option - only about a 2 minute walk from a wealth of cafes and restaurants.

The place feels cozy and comfortable.

There was a bit of noise with car traffic at the front on the sofas, but nothing we couldn't deal with by sleeping in the rooms towards the back.

All in all a solid apartment and we enjoyed it.  Thanks for the stay!

Love it. Aybike was so helpful and friendly. Finally we met at time we checked out. She helped for airport transfer as well. 
About her property, felt like own home. She prepares needs for guests including for cooking. 
Location is close to bus station, Mosque, and Taksim square. 
Truly recommended ;)
We had a great time at this apartment

Aybike's place is located perfectly, on a short five minute walk to a lively, student part of town. The place was not too big, but we fitted okay with 8 guys. 
As a host, Aybike is perfect. Very quick with communication and she will help eagerly, like by arranging transfers from the airport. Also speaks perfect english. 
All in all, a great stay, that I would recommend for everyone!

Aybike probably is the best host we’ve had :) 
She met us in late evening, explained everything clear, was really helpful all the time. Especially saved our evening - small snacks, ‘cause it was late to go to have a dinner and we were exhausted by getting here, so right what we needed at that time. 
Apartment looks good, maybe not that fancy as on photos but living room is truly authentic :) 
I like fresh air, and felt a bit uncomfortable in bedroom, it’s hard to air the room. 
But overall experience was good!

Aybike and her family are wonderful hosts. Their cozy apartment was home to me and my family for a week, during which Aybike was always quick to respond whenever her help was needed. The ever-lively Istiklal street and Taksim square are just a few minutes away on foot. We enjoyed our stay and would strongly recommend it to others.
The apartment is good and Aybike and her mother are very kindly but the building is dirty and there is bad smell in it

The apartment is in a good location close to Taksim Square. Aybike is very helpful and provides all needs as possible. My check out was at 1 pm and she happily let me keep the luggage inside until the time of my flight. I would stay there again!

Aybike's mom who was very friendly met us at the apartment and gave us snacks when we arrived in the morning. The place was comfortable and clean. The location was absolutely perfect, only a short walk to the shops and restaurants.  Aybike was available to answer any questions we had and was very helpful. 
Thank you Aybike :)!

NOUS vous remercions pour votre accueil et disponibilite..Aybike est une personne tres gentille et (Website hidden by Airbnb) vous recommande parfaitement cette  adresse...Elle nous a très bien recu et aider surtout..

Our stay in Itanbul was really nice.Aybike is lovely and was really helpfull as she held our luggage til our departure to the airport .Just one thing: the room that looks onto the street is noisy because of a metal speed bump.

Aybike was a great host, very responsive and nice. the apartment is cosy and well equiped. The only thing is that the third bedroom is not a separate one, it's a part of the living room. AC and WIFI worked well !

Aybike is a great host. she was incredibly helpful and helped us with commuting to the airport. also when the weather got really hot she got us a fan super quick. if I ever go back to Istanbul I will definitely stay at her apartment again.
Aybike has a great place for a group. It is a cozy apartment in a great central location. Check-in and out was great, and we got some nice recommendations.   Would definitely recommend.

This place very close to taksim and istiklal with lots of shops and restaurants near by
Aybike is very kind and excellent knowledge about the city,highly recommended for everyone

Our stay in Aybike's apartment was perfect for our trip. Leading up to, and during, our trip she was always very communicative and helpful, and even offered to assist with transport from the airport! The location was great, being a good walking distance to the old city and very close to Taksim Square and a metro station. Overall, had an amazing time in Istanbul and Aybike's place was great :)

Aybike’s flat is in a great location - really close to lots of restaurants and bars and within walking distance of everything we wanted to see. The flat is cosy but had everything we needed and Aybike greeted us warmly and was attentive and helpful before and during our stay.  There is quite a bit of traffic noise at the front of the flat even during the night which might not suit light sleepers but Istanbul seems like a 24 hour city and it was worth it for the location. I would highly recommend Aybike’s place - great value in a great city!!
Une hôtesse très sympathique qui répond très rapidement à nos demandes. Je vous la recommande.
Great host. We really enjoyed staying at Aybike’s place

Great host.. great apartment.. great location..

Next to Tarlabasi Ave. and three blocks away from the famous Istiklal Ave. and Taksim Square.

Easy to access Karakoy, Besiktas and Eminonu.

We really enjoyed staying at Aybike!
She is a wonderful host, very welcoming and hospitable. We were met by her mother, but Aybike was always in touch. The apartment is cozy, has everything you need. Near the corner there is an excellent cafe with breakfast, and within walking distance of all the attractions of the city. We practically did not use public transport, walked all the time, although Aybike left us a pass. A bit noisy from the street, but I always have earplugs with me on trips, so I don’t see any problems with that. And on the contrary, these are the sounds of the city, without them you will not taste it to the end :)
Oh, and Aybike helped us with the return transfer to Sabiha airport, was very clear and on time. Very grateful, our holiday was great thanks to Aybike, including :)

Aybike was an outstanding hostess. She went over and above our expectations in helping us with bookings, transfers, a tour guide for a day.  She responded to all messages with questions about the apartment instantly, which was very helpful as we settled in.
The apartment is comfortable and has all you may need.  It is in a bustling city so expect some noise in the lounge area through the day and night.  A great atmosphere in the area and very close to the main touristic attractions.
What an amazing flat, Aybike was very nice with us. Perfect location, we highly recommend it !

Aybike is a wonderful host and she made sure to take care of all the things necessary for our easy arrival and departure. Commute from and to the airport was a breeze with a toddler because she took care of the booking of the transportation. She was also always responsive on (Hidden by Airbnb) and over phone. I might have expected her house to be slightly more than what I imagined from the pictures but it was comfortable and equipped nevertheless. So that wasn’t a big deal. The location of the house is very close to the busy İstiklal street and the bus stop ‘Ömer Hayyam’ has frequent connectivity to ‘Taksim Square’ and Ominonu. The only downside we felt was we had to climb stairs to reach the bus stop and it was not fun to do so with a stroller to carry around. But without a stroller I’d not have worried about this situation. Our 5 day stay was comfortable expect the continuous rain dampened spirit a bit. Her parents whom we met on the day we left were very sweet people. Overall I’m thankful to Aybike for her hospitality and everything.

First just i want too say thank u for the apartment owner.. because she was very nice with me .. But I was very angry because the apartment is not as in the pictures and there are only two rooms! The apartment is very old and the taste of the water is very disgusting! And the area is not good and the smell of the building is disgusting and there they don’t have Left drawer .. I do not recommend to live there!! Its was the worst experience for me!!! ❌❌❌❌❌

Staying at Aybike’s place was great. All exceeded expectations! Her communication, quick responses, her help on local tips and private transfer she arranged are superb. Good area with close distance to restaurants and subway. The only thing I’d say is that street is kinda noisy so that if apartment would be packed it worth to bring ear plugs with you as only one room (which is close to window to street) sometimes is noisy. Otherwise that’s more than you can expect! Aybike is great host! Thanks for hosting us. All the best!

Квартира полностью соответствует описанию, представленному на сайте. Находится в самом центре Стамбула. До улицы Истикляль 5 минут неспешной ходьбы. 
	Айбике прекрасная хозяйка – в доме есть все необходимое. Все детали обстановки подобраны в оригинальном жанре. 
	Отец Айбике встретил нас очень радушно, несмотря на то, что было уже 3 часа ночи. Айбике быстро выходит на связь и всегда готова прийти на помощь.
	Из минусов, хочу заметить наличие сигаретного дыма, распространяющегося с нижнего этажа дома. А также высокий шум с улицы, который не прекращается даже ночью. Шум, преимущественно, исходит от лежачего полицейского, который устроен в виде больших граблей, расположенных таким образом, чтобы машины могли ехать только в одном направлении. Улица, на которую выходят окна квартиры, с односторонним движением и грабли срабатывают с изящным скрежетом каждый раз, когда на лежачий полицейский наезжают колеса автотранспорта. 
	В остальном хозяйка сделала все возможное для нашего комфортного проживания. Большое спасибо Айбике!

This flat has an amazing location. It’s 5-6 min walk to taksim sq and famous İstiklal street, about 10min walk to nearest metro station. Has 24 hour food and  shops right outside the flat! Amenities are basic but suited us well. I would suggest taking slippers as the wooden floor is cold in winter,  leave the windows open to let in the hustle and bustle of Istanbul !! No balcony with a view, and there’s a flight of winding stairs to get to the flat which isn’t glamorous but the place is VERY safe!
Muy buena localización y muy buenos anfitriones!! Repetiría
we stayed for the weekent in the appartment and it was great.. although the building is old aybike has a renewed appartment clean, perfect for families, close to taksim and bus station and metro.

The best place to stay in Istanbul. The place is really near to Taksim Square. Once you get out from the house, you can just walk up around 5 minutes. Then, you will be at the Istiklal Street and it just 5 minutes walk to get to Taksim Square. Also, it is so nearby to Galata Tower too. It is easy to connect with public transportation as the metro station is just nearby. This place is also nearby to the Istiklal Street. The famous shopping street in Istanbul. So, I highly recommend this place to anyone out there when you want to visit Istanbul. Aybike is a very good host. She offered me a help if i had left something in Bursa. Well that was a really over the top of attitude. What an amazing person she is!

name: Heroísmo IV
summary: If the dates you wish are not available, we have other options in the same location. You can find them on my profile. My goal is for you to have your days with the most comfort i can propose. I want you to taste all the feelings in Porto, as our food, as our best places, our best pointviews. I just love to help you enjoying this beautiful city :)
space: “Ilhas” were constructed by the employers and were usually located in the back of the employer’s houses. They are made of rows of 10/12 single-storer houses, with approximately 15m2 are each, placed along a narrow corridor. This typology appeared due to the kind of land subdivision used by that time. The lot was 25 spans, 5,5 m wide and could reach 100m long. with toilets located at the end of the plot serving all the houses… The industrialisation of the city led to a demographic growth which in turn led to this kind of housing spreading all over the city, specially near the industries. In the beginning of the 20th century 30% of Oporto’s population was living in “Ilhas”. The industrialisation of the city led to a demographic growth which in turn led to this kind of housing spreading all over the city, specially near the industries. In the beginning of the 20th century 30% of Oporto’s population was living in “Ilhas”. The low wages of the workers allowed them to live only in the cheape
description: If the dates you wish are not available, we have other options in the same location. You can find them on my profile. My goal is for you to have your days with the most comfort i can propose. I want you to taste all the feelings in Porto, as our food, as our best places, our best pointviews. I just love to help you enjoying this beautiful city :) “Ilhas” were constructed by the employers and were usually located in the back of the employer’s houses. They are made of rows of 10/12 single-storer houses, with approximately 15m2 are each, placed along a narrow corridor. This typology appeared due to the kind of land subdivision used by that time. The lot was 25 spans, 5,5 m wide and could reach 100m long. with toilets located at the end of the plot serving all the houses… The industrialisation of the city led to a demographic growth which in turn led to this kind of housing spreading all over the city, specially near the industries. In the beginning of the 20th century 30% of Oporto’s popu
neighborhood_overview: At 20m walking distance or 5m by metro you can find Torre dos Clérigos, Estação de São Bento, Avenida dos Aliados, Ribeira, Sé do Porto and much, much more...  Several restaurants, with all kind of cuisines, as leisure and cultural places can be found in the area. It´s a great spot downtown Be my Guest!!
notes: In the apartment you will find everything you need to spend a few pleasant days with all the confort. Accommodate 2 people, fully equipped kitchenette with all the utensils, oven, stove, refrigerator, microwave, extractor. Plates, cups and cutlery available.  Sheets, duvet, pillows and towels available. The bedroom has a very comfortable double bed with 2,00 x 1,60 mt.
transit: If you prefer a more comfortable ride from the airport to the apartment or from the apartment to the airport we dispose of a personalized transport service: In the airport the driver will be waiting for you at the arrivals exit with your name written on a board. He will drive you in a private car directly to the apartment, and the cost is 25 euro. If you choose to come by subway it will cost about 4 euro per person but it would take you more or less 1 hour to get to the apartment. The front door of the apartment is 10 meters from the metro station Heroísmo.
access: You can enjoy all area outdoor, and off course, the apartment you will reserve.
interaction: I'm always available to help as much as I can for my guests to spend a wonderful time in Porto.
house_rules: I ask all the care with: - Noise from the 22 hours, especially when it comes to reach the apartment. - With decorative objects, furniture, bedding and bath, care in the handling of kitchen equipment. I am always available to answer any questions.

host.host_about:
Welcome!
The apartments has all the things to provide you a perfect days in Porto. It is located in a very central area, inside a typical oporto building. 
I will give you lots of informations about Porto, my personal tips, and I'll always be available to help you with anything. All I want is for you to go home knowing Porto and inevitably loving the city! :)

reviews.comments: Nuno and Francisca were extremely kind and helpful people. They made us feel very welcome and the house is surprisingly spacious. The wifi connection did struggle in our room but maybe we just had bad luck. They were even kind enough to extend our stay last minute. The service was top quality and the shower was amazing. Highly recommend staying here.
Muito simpáticos e atenciosos. O apartamento é muito confortável e com pequenos detalhes que fazem a diferença. Muito perto do metro, o que é óptimo para deslocações necessárias.

Bonjour, Notre séjour a été très agréable. Nous avons été très bien accueillies. Nuno nous a donné de nombreux conseils, lieux de visites... Le logement était également très bien. Nous avons vraiment pu profiter de Porto. Le métro est tout proche du logement. C'était vraiment un très bon séjour. Merci encore.

Our stay at Heroísmo IV was the perfect Airbnb experience. When we got there, Francisca was waiting for us. She was extremely nice and accommodating, she showed us the apartment and gave us a map of the city and plenty of tips about what to visit, where to eat, etc. The apartment is really small but has absolutely everything you need. It's clean, new, has a really nice kitchen, a very comfortable bed and is near the city center (we walked everyday). I highly recommend staying at Nuno's place. ¡Gracias por todo, Francisca! Porto is a beautiful city, we hope to come back soon!

A nice litte appartement. We arrived very late but were kindly greeted by the host. She showed us arround and gave us very useful tips (where to go/ where to eat/ etc.). The appartement is located directly to a metro station and has a Lidl and other grocery stores very near by.  It was a perfect stay!

Квартира не большая и очень уютная. В ней есть все необходимое. Отличное расположение рядом с метро. Я получила много полезной информации при заселении. Во время сильного дождя в ней сыро, но это не испортило отдых.

Desde o primeiro contacto, a comunicação foi muito fácil e clara. Colocaram à nossa disposição uma série de hipóteses de transporte a partir do aeroporto, bem como a possibilidade de termos em casa cabazes de alimentos. Assim que chegamos, com toda a sua simpatia, tinhamos a Mariana à nossa espera, recebeu-nos explicando os vários  pontos importantes para quem chega: locais a visitar, restaurantes, transportes...
Gostámos muito do espaço, do Porto, fazemos questão de voltar em breve. Local excelente!

Francisca was very friendly and was waiting for us, she took the time to explain us everything about the flat, she even let us good adresses of restaurants, coffees and places to visit in Porto.
The flat is 10 minutes by foot from the center, with no stairs to climb, good for our heavy luggages! It is very calm and we even had a table outside where we took our breakfasts. The flat is tiny but very functional, clean, and well equipped.
It is perfect for a short time in Porto.

The apartment is great value for money and the location is fantastic. We arrived before the check in time but were greeted promptly and could leave our luggage to explore the city straight away. Francisca gave us a lot of good advice and recommendations for the city, which was very helpful.
Thank you for hosting us Nuno. Our trip was perfect. The host was very kind. And the apartment is beautiful, near the center and is well think : it has everything for a few days.

Estúdio muito simpático e limpo. Ideal para uma ou duas pessoas, para explorar o Porto durante um par de dias. Estação de metro à porta. Perto da zona histórica do Porto — faz-se bem a pé. Pastelaria ideal para pequeno almoço mesmo à porta.

L'emplacement est parfait, dans un quartier calme et à proximité immédiate du métro et du centre-ville. Seul bémol: l'absence d'eau chaude à la douche (un seul ballon d'eau chaude disponible pour plusieurs appartements), franchement regrettable en plein coeur de l'hiver. Ce qui du coup entraîne un rapport qualité-prix un peu cher

El apartamento esta genial, es pequeño pero tiene todo lo necesario, cama super grande y cómoda, el apartamento está en general como nuevo y se ve exactamente como las fotos, estaba todo suuuuper limpio y tienen un radiador que calienta el habitáculo en muy poco tiempo. Nos recibió Rita, y de maravilla, nos dio un montón de información sobre Porto en un momento y nos dejó un montón de mapas e info útil. la zona es tranquila y tiene un montos de aparcamiento seguro en la misma calle. Aun que no está en el mismo centro de la ciudad se llega a el en un paseo de poco más de 10 mins, además en la misma puerta hay una parada de metro. Ha sido una experiencia genial quedarnos aquí para visitar la ciudad. Muchas gracias por la amabilidad, si volvemos a la ciudad no dudaríamos en volver a quedarnos aquí.

Gostamos muito do espaco, pequeno mas muito agradavel. Excelente para passar apenas uns dias. Obrigada ao Nuno que esperou por nos ate tarde e que ainda tirou um tempinho para nos explicar e dar umas dicas sobre a cidade! Aconselho!

Небольшая, но очень уютная квартирка со всем необходимым! Завтракать на свежем воздухе очень приятно, в кухне можно приготовить все, что захочешь! Очень гостеприимная хозяйка, рассказала много интересного о местах поблизости и в городе!
Excelente Studio, muito bem localizado e com todas as comodidades necessárias para uma pequena estadia.

The flat is situated right next to a metro station. Also perfect, if you arrive by car - free parking just in front. 15 mins walk to downtown but lot of cheap cafes and restaurants full of locals around.
The check-in was perfect. We got lots of information, what to do/see/where to eat. Thanks for that. 
The Apartement is very small but for a short city visit, big enough. If you stay for a week or so, I would recommend a larger Apartement.

Fantástica estancia en Oporto. Apartamento pequeño pero suficiente para pasar unos días en  Oporto una pareja. Situado un poco a las afueras pero muy buena comunicación  con el centro (parada de metro y autobús enfrente del apartamento).
Atención inmejorable del anfitrión, respondiendo muy rápido a nuestras consultas y gestionando nuestra llegada. El único fallo es que la lavadora no se podía utilizar. Muy recomendable para pasar unos días en Oporto relación calidad-precio.

We had a very nice welcome where we received tips about the neighbourhood. Those we tried turned out excellent. It's a 15 to 20 minute walk to the centre, the room is small but it has everything you need and is well maintained. Very close to the subway, a small outdoor area where you can sit. 
Tip: sandwiches (pork with cheese) from casa guedes
Excelente relação preço qualidade, muito boa comodidade e excelentes acessos. Muitas opções para as refeições por perto e metro à porta. Recomendo.

We would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Porto - clean, cozy, and close to the city centre/transit stations. 
The hosts were amazing and offered invaluable tips on where to explore and eat around the city. We really enjoyed our stay, thank you!

Thank you very much for apartments. They are small, but with everything you, with a good location to the center. There are bus/ metro stations near the apartment, bars, supermarkets, restaurants,  it was really convenient. Thank you again for hospitality and your recommendations and help throughout the whole trip :)

I would highly recommend Nuno. The apartment is practical, in a quiet, safe and up and coming area. Really clean. Our host, Toni, was fantastic! Accommodated our requests and gave us great recommendations. Loved the city. If you want to visit Porto definitely book Nuno’s place.

Le petit studio était équipé avec tout ce qu il faut pour passer une nuit de sommeil réparateur, pour nous rafraîchir avec une bonne douche froide et reprendre la route, en repartant de la gare des bus toute proche. Il est bien situé sur la ligne de métro qui vient de l aéroport. Accueil précis et gentil.
Nice flat and very nice host.

Bon séjour passé a Porto, l’accueil faite par Nuno était vraiment très bien ainsi que ces explications sur la ville. La propreté était correct par contre la machine a laver était inutilisable, ce qui n’est pas indiqué avant. Manque aussi de rangement pour disposer ses affaires. Malgré tout je recommande ce logement qui est bien situé.

Timely and efficient communication is a stand out for this host. I got messaged loads of information prior to my stay, the morning of my arrival I got messages introducing who would me meeting at the apartment, and on arrival we were shown everything including recommendations for the town and our stay - just like you'd get at a hotel or hostel reception. The location is perfect, right by the metro station and with lots of amenities such as cafes, supermarkets and restaurants within a short walk. The centre is walking distance away if you don't mind hills, we never took public transport our whole stay. We enjoyed breakfast on the terrace and having coffee, tea and water ready for our arrival was really helpful after a long journey. Thank you we'd love to come back one day!

We had a great time in the apartment! It is very well situated next to the train station. So it is very easy to get to the airport. Also the supermarket, restaurants and all the beautiful things to explore in Porto are easy to access in walking distance. We were given a very warm welcome with lots of nice recommendations for Porto. In the apartment we had everything we needed and more. We would always come again!
nice experience and good apartment
Nothing special to say, just a ok place to stay. A bit small, but well organised.

It's a cosy studio just a few meters from a metro station and a walking distance to Campahna rail station. It has all necessary amenities, is clean and modern. However, the space is really small (but we were aware of that). Nono is a nice host, I recommend!

name: Cozy House in Ortaköy
summary: There are 2 bedrooms and a living room in the house. 1 Bathroom. 1 Kitchen. Friendly neighbourhood. Close to sea side and Historical places.
description: There are 2 bedrooms and a living room in the house. 1 Bathroom. 1 Kitchen. Friendly neighbourhood. Close to sea side and Historical places.

name: Condomínio Praia Barra da Tijuca
summary: Amplo e arejado apto de 2 quartos no Cond. Barramares, localizado em frente a praia da Barra da Tijuca. Há mini-mercado, farmácia, restaurantes, cabeleireiro e outras facilidades dentro do cond. e nas redondezas. Wi-fi e ambiente familiar.
description: Amplo e arejado apto de 2 quartos no Cond. Barramares, localizado em frente a praia da Barra da Tijuca. Há mini-mercado, farmácia, restaurantes, cabeleireiro e outras facilidades dentro do cond. e nas redondezas. Wi-fi e ambiente familiar. The guests will be free to enjoy the building pool and sauna. It is near restaurants, beach, convinience stores, hotels, bus stop and much more. The Condominium is located across from an excellent beach area and next to bars, restaurants, laundromats, bus stop as well other facilities.
notes: The Condominium is located across from an excellent beach area and next to bars, restaurants, laundromats, bus stop as well other facilities.
transit: It is near restaurants, beach, convinience stores, hotels, bus stop and much more.
access: The guests will be free to enjoy the building pool and sauna.
house_rules: Try to keep the place clean and tidy.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Foi excelente! O condomínio é super completo, ficamos muito felizes nessa temporada! E a Paula é uma grande anfitriã, atenciosa e sempre pronta pra ajudar! Valeu!

A anfitriã e super cuidadosa e solicita. O apto e super aconchegante e as facilidades e localização do Condomínisio são 10. Alguns detalhes mostram o cuidado dela: utensílios de cozinha mto bons, camas feitas com capricho, secador de cabelo de ótima qualidade, kit de primeiros socorros e até chocolatinho de boas vindas! Chuveiro com muita água. Tv a cabo.
A Ana foi muito atenciosa, deixando tudo perfeito para aproveitarmos ao máximo os Jogos Olímpicos!
We spent a few days by Paula in Rio and can only spend Nice words for everything

PERFECT Is the Main word for our Stay in Rio. the area where Paula's house is located is very nice.  We had the feeling that it was a safe area. The appartment was clean, confortable and fulfilled all our expectations. We where in Rio to see the Paralympic Games and it was an amazing city. The wifii connection in the appartment was the best we could find all over Rio. We can only say thank's to Paula for her ospitality and recomend her appartment to Every one.

Grazie Mille Paula

Tudo perfeito!!! Excelente para quem quer ficar na Barra da Tijuca. De frente para o mar, próximo de paradas de ônibus, mercado, padaria, farmácia, estações de bicicleta. Em um condomínio com toda a infraestrutra.

O apartamento é ótimo, confortável, limpo, tudo funciona perfeitamente, roupas de cama suficiente mobiliário confortável, muito próximo da praia o condomínio tem mercado, padaria, farmácia bem próximo, muito tranquilo. Recomendo.

Excelente el trato con Paula que estuvo siempre a nuestra disposicion... el depto por un lado y el condominio Barramares por otro, son mejor que lo que yo esperaba... la limpieza, prolijidad, equipamiento y atención de la gran cantidad de gente que trabaja allí fueron sobresalientes...

Excelente apartamento, muy comodo. Condominio espectacular, frente a un lindo lugar de la playa en la Barra de Tijuca. La anfitriona muy atenta y dispuesta a resolver todos los inconvenientes. Super recomendable

O apto é como nas fotos, limpo, 1 suite e 1 quarto com 2 camas. O condominio é bem grande, fica na frente da praia mas tem uma pequena caminhada dentro dele pra chegar até a saída. Nada longo se vc não estiver carregando muita coisa. A comunicação com a Paula foi maravilhosa. Ela sempre respondeu tudo muito rápido e o acesso ao apartamento foi tranquilo. O fato de ter um cofre na porta de entrada ajuda muito se vc estiver viajando com outras pessoas. Assim a chave fica sempre guardada lá para caso as pessoas cheguem separadas no apto. Muito funcional.
A única coisa que eu sugeri pra Paula é ter toalhas. Chegamos lá e não encontramos toalhas. Apenas roupas de cama. Mesmo o anuncio dizendo que o apartamento não tinha, essa informação fica um pouco escondida em "básicos". Só percebi que "básico" era toalhas, roupa de cama e sabonetes depois que cheguei. Isso atrapalhou um pouco. Mas, tendo isso em vista, tudo certo com todo o resto.
The host canceled this reservation 32 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Good choice if you need to be in Barra da Tijuca

Departamento apto para cuatro personas, muy comodo y bien equipado.- Cocina grande con mesa para desayunar. los dos cuartos con aire 
acondicionado. Está dentro de un complejo con seguridad las 24 hs.- Limpio y funciona todo.
Lo unico que debería chequear son los calefones que dan agua caliente a los baños, ya que te podes estar bañando y se corta el agua caliente.

Fantástico o apartamento de Paula! Condomínio bastante família, região segura, tem mercado e padaria próximos, e o cuidado e zelo desta anfitriã são impressionantes! Ficamos realmente muito satisfeitos! Recomendo demais!m

Paula foi super atenciosa, deu dicas sobre locais perto, não houve nenhum stress pra entrar ou chegar ate o apto! Condminio otimo, bem localizado, facil acesso, seguro! Apto agradavel, camas e banho otimos! Tudo excelente

Recomiendo 100% el departamento, por ubicacion, seguridad y servicios. Paula siempre estuvo dispuesta y muy responsable.
Saludos
The host canceled this reservation 84 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Excelente anfitriã e localização ótima!
